item.text: sad d+hamadun Da u0f7a kanA ma ma hAyA
na sU tra/ bod skadadu/dam nga la/ chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg
pa chen po'i mdo/ kabam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang
bya @#// chub sems dang 'a thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod/
kyi phung po ri la bzhugs te/ dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong ba dag 'dun chen po bram
[>cad kyang/ dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyonamos pa med pa// dbang dang ldan ng
gyur ba/ sams shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shinatu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas ba/
byed pa byas ba/ khur bor ba/ bdag gis don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas so/
shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam ba'i pha rol tu son pa/ mngon par shes pas/ mngon par shes pa'i nyan
thos chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang/ tshodang ldan pa rta thul dang/ tshadang ldan pa rlangs pa dang/ tshe
dang ldan ba mi chen dang/ tshadang ldan pa bzang po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang/ tshadang
ldan pa chu klung 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang/ tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
gyi bu chen pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pam 'gags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka pan dang/
tshadang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nga yin da'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang/ tshe dang ldan nga
b+ha ra d+hA tsadang/ tshadang ldan pa dga' bo dang/ tshe dang ldan ng nye dga' dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang/ tshadang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang/
tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshodang ldan ba sgra gcan zin dang/ de dag dang nyan thosachen bo gzhan dag dang/ slob pa tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/
gzhan yang slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong nyis stong dang/ skye dgu'i bdag motshan mo la sogs pa dge slong ma drug stong dang/ sgra gcan zin gyi ma dge
tsa slong ma grags 'dzin 'khor dang nganus pa dang thabs gcig go/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khra thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
ldog pa// gzungs thob pa// spobs dachen po la gnas pa// phyir ma ldeg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas brgya stong nang de la bsnyan bkur byas pa/
sangs rgyas brgya stongamang po la dgekha' rtse ba bskyed pa// sangs rgyas brgya stongamang pos yang dag par bstod pa/ lus dang dag dang sams byams pas yongs su bsgos pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa 'a yi shes la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa// shes rab chen po shes rab kyi ra rol tu phyin pa rtogs par kheng du chud pa 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong mang por
rnam par grags pa/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yang dag par sgrol ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dang la gzhon/
nur gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpagamathu chen thob dang/ byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub ces bya ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dad/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson pa ma gtong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' legan rin chen dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal
bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' smanamang dag 'phags dang/ byachub sems dpa' bkodapa' rgyal bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin bdang//
byung nub sams dpa' rin chen zla ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zla gang dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnonapa chen po dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' mtha' yas gnon dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum gnon dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pachan po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag par
rgyun du brtson dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sa 'dzin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zadapa dang/ byung chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpa' dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skarama'i
rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangag de dag dang yang thabs gcig go/ bzang skyongal sogs pa skyes bu dam pa
bcu drug la 'di lta ste/ bzang skyong dang/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang/ ded dpon bzang po dang/ mes byin dang/ phug sbas dang/ chus byin dang/ dbang pos byinadang/
bla ma'i blo gros dang/ khyad par blo gros dang/ 'bol ba'i blo gros dang/ mthong ba don yod pa dang/ shin tu yang dag zhugs pa dang/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang/
dpe med blo gros dang/ ma'i snying po dang/ sa 'dzin dag dang/ yang thabs gcig ste/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dag dang yang thabs gcig go/
lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin dang/ 'khor lha'i bu nyi khri'od lta ste/ lhabu zla ba dang/ lha'i bu nyi ma dang/ kun tu dridang/ namana'od dang/ lha'i bu sna'od dang/ de
dag la sogs pa'i lha'i bu nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig go/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ 'khor lha'i bu sum khri 'dalta ste/ rgyal bo nabo 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen po/
mig mi bzang dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srungs dang/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ lca'abu dbang phyug dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang/ 'khoralha'i bu sum khri
dag dang yang thabs gcig go/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshas pa dang/ 'khor tshangs risakyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong 'do ste/ tshangs pa gtsug phudacan dang/ tshangs pa skar ma'i
'od dang/ dedag la sogs pa tshangs risakyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig go klu'i rgyal po brgyad 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' po dang/ nyi dga' dang/ rgyu
mtshodang/ nor rgyas kyi ba dang/ 'jog ngo dang/ gzican dang/ ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po ut+pal dang/ 'khor klu bya ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs gcig go/
ma 'amaca'i rgyal po bzhi 'di lta ste/ ma'amacu'i rgyal po len pa dang/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po nasachenadang/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po chos bzas dad/ mi'am ci'i
rgyal po chos 'dzin dang/ 'khoram 'am ci bya ba brgya stongamang po dag dang yang thabs gcig go/ driza'i ris kyi lha'abu bzhi 'di lta ste/ dri za yad du 'ong ba dang/ yadedu 'ongadabyangs
dang/ 'jam snyan dang/ dri za dbyangs snyan dang/ 'khor dra ze bye ba brgya stongamang bo dag dang yang thabs gcig ge lha ma yin gyi dbang bo bzhi 'od lta ste/ lha ma yAn gyi dbang po
stobs can dang/ phrug rtsub dang/ thags zangs ras dang/ lha ma yin gyi debang po sgra gcan dang/ 'khor lha ma yin bya ba brgya stongamang po dag dang yang thabs gcig go/ nus
mkha' lding gi dbang po bzhi 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gzi brjid chen po dang/ lus chen dang/ rdzogs chen dang/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'phrul chan thob dang/
zla 'khoranamamakha' ldang bye ba brgya stong mngapo dag dang yang thabs gcig go/ lus 'phags mo'i byi yul ma ga d+ha'irgyal po ma skyes dgra dang yang thabs gcig go/ de'atshon bcom ldan 'das
'khor bzhi po de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bltas te/ bas stang dubyas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ rjed par byas/ gsol bar byas te/
ngas par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'achos kyi rnam grasam do shan tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad/
bar bzhad de/ chos kyi gdan de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas nas/ mtha' las nges par bstan pa'aganas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skum g.yo zhing sams mi
g.yo bar gyur nas bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs m thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'am togamanar dang/ mnar chen po dang/ many+dzasha ka dang/ many+dzasha
kachen po rnamasakyi ma tog kha char chen po mngon par bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das da'akhor bzhi po de dag la 'thoro// thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong rnam pa drug tu gson
par myur te/ 'gul kun tu ra gtu 'gul/ ldegakun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//de'atsho dge slong dang/ dge slongam dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge
bsnyenam dang/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yinadang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang/
rgyal phran dang/ stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba gang dag 'khor der 'dus nas 'khodapar gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan
'das la lta zhing 'khod de/ ngomatsharadu gyur/ rmad du gyur/ shin tu dga' bar gyur to// de nas de'atsho bcom ldan 'das kyi sman mtshams kyi/
mdzod nas 'od zer gcig byung nas de shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri brgyad stong du song ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yanAchad
srid pa'i rtse mo man chad 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi 'gro ba drug po de dag na sems can gang yod pa de dag thams cad m lus par snang ngo//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tshogazhes pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang 'chad pa de dag
thams cad kyang ma lus par grag go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgan dge slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyonam dang/ rnal 'byor can dang/ rnal 'byor
sbyod pa gang dag 'bras bu thob pa dang/ 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po gang dag nyan pa dang/
dmigs pa dang/ mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'argyu'i thabs la mkhas pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
dgan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag thams cad kyang snangango// sangs rgyasakyi zhing de dag thums cad nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
gang dag yongs su myu ngan las 'dus pa rnams kyi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che las byas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo// de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byams pa 'di snyams du sams te/ kye ma de bzhin gshags pas ltasacho 'phrul chen po bstan pa 'di 'dodi ci'i rgyur 'gyur zhig gu/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis lcas mo/
'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
pa 'di lta bu 'ad dag kyang snangabar gyur pa 'di'i don bdag ga su la dri/ 'dan don 'di'i lan ldonanus pa ni su yodasnyam mo// de nas yang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa 'di/ sngon gyi rgyul b rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// sangs rgyas mang bo la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis
snganachad kyang/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltas 'di lta bu byung ba rnams mthong zhing/ sngon chad chosachen po'i 'bel
ba'i gtam dag kyang myong bas na/ bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la de'i don 'dri'i snyam du sems so// dge slong dang/ dge slongam dang/
dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi po de dang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang//
lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang ma ma yin pa mang po de dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mo 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur/
ltad mor gyur te 'dasAm du/ bcom ldanus kyi ltas gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa bdag cag gsi su la dri snyam du sems so// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa soms kyi shes nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon/
nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi ltas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rdzu 'phrul gyi snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/ sangs rgyus kyi zhing khri brgyad stong
pa 'di dag rnam par bkra ba/ mchog tu blta na sdug pa// de bzhan gshegs pa sngon du bzhud pa// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su 'dren par snang ba 'di'i rgyu gang rkyen gang/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smas so// 'jam dpal ci ya phyir na 'di/
lta bu // ma yi mgon pos 'od zer gcig po 'ad// zhal gyi smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spunas// shinatu snang ba'i 'od zer rab tu btang// lha rnams dga' bsatsan dan phyi ma dang
lhaya sIs rab yid du 'ong ba dang// man+dar dang man dzusha ka ya// ma tog dag gi char chen rab tu phab// des nas 'akun tu mdzes gyur cing// 'khor bzhi 'di dag dga'
ba rab tu thob// zhing rnams 'di dag thams cad rnam drug tu// shani du 'jigs pa'i gzugs su kun nas g.yos// 'od zer de yi shar gyi phyogs legs kyi// zhingan stong
phrag bco brgyad tshang ba rnams // skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu snang// zhing rnams gsar gyi kha dog bzhin dumadzes// mnar med yan chad srid pa 'a rtsi mo'i bar//
zhing de dag na sems can ji snyed pa// 'gro ba drug po don yod pa rnams // gang dag der yang 'pho skya ba rnams // de dag lasakyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang// 'gro ba bde dang mi bde
rnams kyang snang// bzang bo ngan pa de bzhin bar nga yang// 'don 'dug kyang de dag thams cad mathong// sangs rgyas seng ge mi yi dbang bo rnams // chos nyid rab ston rnam par 'byed
pa mthong// sems can bye ba mang la rab ston pa// sAn pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su gsung ba dag/ zab cing rgya chermad du byung ba'i sgra// so so'i zhing rnams su yarab/
tu 'byani// dpe dang gtan tshig khrag khrig bya ba yis// sangs rgyas chos 'di rab tu ston pa// sems can ganga rnams sdug bsngal gzir ba dag/ skye dang dga' bas yid skyo mngeshes
la// 'di ni dag slong sdug bsngal thamazhes// de la rab zhamya ngan 'das pa ston// ma rnams gang gis rgya chamathu thob cing// sangs rgyas mthong bas de bzhin bsod nams ldan// de
dag lan chos tshul 'di rjod cing// rang rgyal thag pa yang na ston pa mdzad// gzhan yang bde bar gshegs kyi sras po gang// blunamed pa'i ye shes tshor ba dag/ bya ba sna tshogs rtag
tu byed pa la// de dag la ni byang chub phyir bsngags gsungs// 'di na 'dug bzhin de na 'di 'dra dang// khyad par gzhan yang stong phrag bya ba dag/ shin tu mthong zhing thos ti 'jam pa'i
dbyangs// de dag las ni phyogs tsam smos par bya// bdagA mthong zhing rnams mang po de dgana'ang// byung chub sa mas dpa' gang+ga'i bye ma snyed// gang rnams bya ba stong phrag mi nyung ba//
brtson 'grus rnam pa mang bos byang chub bskyed// la la sbyin pa sbyin pa'ang de bzhin te// nor dang mgron bu gsar dang dngul rnams dang// mu tiganor bu man shel bya ru dang// na po
bran mo rta dang shang rta lug/ de bzhin rin chen dag gis brgyan pa 'khyogs// yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa gtong// bdag cag gis kyang thegamchog thob shogaces//
byang chub mchog 'dar yongs su sngo ba byed// sbyin pa 'di 'dra 'di dag byin nga san// khams gsum nang na theg mchog khyad par can// sangs rgyas theg pa bde gshegs gang
bsngags pa// den bdag gis myur du thub gyur cig/ la las rta bzhi can gyi shing rtal// kha khyer bcas pam tog rgyal mtshan brgyan// rin chen dag las byas pa'i ba dan can/
la las de lta bu yang sbyin pa byin// de bzhin bu dang chung ma rnams kyang byan// la la phangs pa'arisha yang sbyin par byed// byang chub dam pa 'dan tshol ba'i phyir// lag pa dang nA dang nga
bslangasan byani// la la dag gis mgo dang la las mag/ la la dag gi lus mchog rab kyang gtong// dang ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa rnams byin nas// de bzhin gshegs kyi
ye shes don du gnyer// 'jam dpal bdagagis mthong ba la lan// rgyal srid skyid pa rnam par spangs byas te// btsun mo'i 'khor dang de bzhan gling kun dang// gnyen dang
blon po thams cad rnam spangs nas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren gyi drung dong sta// zhi ba'i phyir ni chos rar mchog 'dri zhing// ngur smrig gos rnamA rab tu gyon byed de// sgra dang ba spu
da na/ dgakyang 'dreg par byed// bdag ma thong byang chub sems dpa' la lan/ dge slong gyur cing nagasatshalaganas pa dag/ dgon pa stong rnams su gnas 'cha'
lal lung nod kha don byed la dgag/ bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la dag/ ri sul dag tu zhugs shing bstan pa rnams // sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rnam
par bsgom// yongs su sems shing nye bar rtog par byed// kha cig gis ni 'dod pa ma lus sangs// yongs bsgoms bdag nyid spyod yul rnam par dag/ mngon par shes pa lnga
yang der thob nas// ngan par shes pa lnga yang dur thab nas// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po dgon par gnas// brtan pa la la rkang bshabs der gnas te// 'dran pa'i
sbyan sngar thal mo sbyar byas nas// dga' ba bskyod de rgyal dbang rgyal po la// tshigs su bcad pa stong gis mngon par bstod// dran dang ldan zhing dul bam 'jigs pa// la la spyod pa
phra ba shes pa dag/ rkang gnyis gtso 'tshos kyang dri bar byed// thos nas de dag chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur// yongs bsgoms bdag nyid rgyal dbang sras po rnams // la la bdag
gis de dang der mthong ba// dpa dang gtan tshigs khrag khrig du ma yis// srog chags bye ba mang la chosa rnams ston// mchog tu dga' skyes chos rnams rab ston cing// byang chub
za sams dpa' mang bo yang dag 'dzud// bdud rnams stobs dang gzhon par bcas bcom ste// chos kyi rje 'dashin tu rdung bar byed// la la bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la// bad
gshegs sras la lham gnod sbyin dang// srin posamachod kyang ngo mtshar ma 'dzin cing// snyoms med zhi zhing rab zhi spyod pa mthong// phal chananagasaganas de bzhin gzhan dag kyang//
snang ba'i 'od na lus las rab gatong ste// somasacan dmyul las sams can rnams 'don cing// de dag byang chub la yang yang dag 'dzud// rgyal ba'i sras po la la brtson 'grus gnas/
kha cig gis kyang ma lus gnyid spangs nas// chags pa med cing nags tshal gnas pa dag/ de dag brtson pas byang chub mchog la zhugs// la la tshul khrims m ral srung bani// rtag tu
rnam dganor bu rin chen bzhin// la la spyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// de dag khrims kyis byang chub mchog la zhugs// rgyal sras la la bzod pa'i stobs can te// dge slong nga rgyal
can dag khro ba dang// de bzhin gshegs zhing bsdig pa'ang bzod par byed// bzod pas de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs// bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la ni// rtsed mo dga'
ba thams cad rnam spangs te// byis pa'i grogs po rnams kyang yongs spangs nas// 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs dga' mnyam par gzhag/ rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems narnam
@#// spangs nas// lo stong bya bar nags dang ra sulan// rtsa gcig sems su bsam gtan byed pa rnams // de dag bsam gtan byang chub mchog la zhugs//
dge 'dun slob bcas rgyal ba mngon sum du// bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin zas dang skom// na ba'i sman ni mi nyung mang bo dag/ kha tsag de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed// dge 'dun
slob bcas rgyal ba mngon sum du// de dag gos brgya bye ba sbyin par byed// la la stong phrag bye ba rgya ra dang// rin thang med pa' gis rnams rab tu 'bul// rin po che dang de bzhin tsan
dan gyi// gtsug lag khang ni byi ba ba byas nas// stan dang mal chamang bos brgyan pa rnams // bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mngonasum 'bul// kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong gtsang
ma rnams // ma rtog 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ skyes bu khyu mchog nyan thos bcas pa la// la la nyin par bzhugs phyir rab tu 'bul// dga' ba skyasanas sna tshogs rnam mang
bo// de lta bu ya sbyin pa sbyin par byed// byin nas byang chub phyire yang brtson 'grus bskyod// sbyin pas de dag byang chub mchog la bzhugs// la la zhi ba'i tshes kyang rab 'chad de// dpa
dang gtan tshigs khrag khrig dum yas// de dag srog chags bye ba stong la ston// de dag yoshes byang chub mchog la zhugs// byed pa med pa'i chos rab shes pa na// gnyis med
rab zhugs nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra ba// ma chags bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po rnams // de dag shes rab byang chub n tsheg la zhugs// bdag gis gzhan yang ma thong ba 'jam pa'i//
dbyangs// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la// byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa mang byung nas// rgyal ba'i ring bsral dag la rim gro byed// mchod rten bye ba stong phrag mi nyung
ba /ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi phyi ma bzhin// gang gis byama' zhing rnams rtag brgyan pa// rgyal sras de dag byed du 'jug pa mthong// rin chen sna bdun ma chog gi rgyal mtshan gdugs//
den bye ba stong rnams bsgong ban// 'phang du dpagatshad lnga stong phyin pa ste// khor yug tu dpagatshad nyis stong yod// rnam rgyal ba dan bcas pa 'khor mor mdzes// dril dang dril bu
g.yemakha rtag tu 'khrol// me tog dri dang do bzhin sa' sAn gyis// lha mi srin po gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod// yongs 'dus shing gi ma tog rgyas pa bzhin// de ltar phyogs/
bcu de dag mdzes byas te// rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la 'di 'dra 'dir// bde gshegs sras kyis mchod pa byed du btsud// rgya'akhas 'od zer gcig po 'di btang bas// lhar
bcas 'jig rten 'di dag rab rgyas pa// bdag dang srog chags bye ba mang bo 'dis// 'di na 'dug bzhin de dag thams cad mthob/ gang gis 'od zer gcig po dang btang bas// zhing
rnams stong phrag mang po ston pa ste// kye ma skyes bu khyu mchog de las mthus// kye ma ye shes rgya che zagamad do// rmad du byung ba tshad med 'di 'dra ba'i// ltas
rnams mthong nas bdag cag ngo mtshar gyur// 'di lo don rnams 'jam dbyis rab ston to// sangs rgyas sras rnams tha tsom gyur pa stsol// 'khor bzhi 'di dag rab tu dga'/
sams kyis// dpa' bo khyod dang bdag la mngon par lta// bde bar gshegs pas de ring ci yi phyir// snang ba 'di 'dra 'danarob tu btang// bde gshegs sras po khyod kyis lul
ston la// dga' ba bskyed cing the tsom rnam par sol// 'di dag 'od zer rgya chen rab btang ba// 'di dgaci 'dra'i don du 'gyur ba zhig/ bde bar gshegs nga skyes bu dam pa yis//
byang chub snying por chos mchog gang bsgos pa// de dag 'jig rten mgon po 'dir 'chad dam// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lung ston tam// zhing rnams stong phrag du ma gang bstan nga//
sna tshogs rab tu bkra ba rin chen brgyan// mtha' yas spyan can sangs rgyas rnam snang ba// 'di ni mi nyung rgyur 'gyur gor ma chag/ rgyal ba'i sras la byams pas kun dris nas// lha mi
gnod sbyin srin po de dag dga'// 'jam dbyangs 'dinaci zhig lung ston ces// 'khor rnams bzhi po de dgashin tu sdod// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan du 'a byang chub sems dpa' tshigs de la snus pa// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa ches chen
bo sgrags pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par dgongs pa// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi charatshon po mngonang ra dbab pa dang/ chos kyi rdza chan po rab tu brdung/
ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang/ chos kyi sgon ma chen po rab tu 'bar bar mdzad pa dang/ chos kyi dung chen po rab tu bud pa/ chos kyi rnga bo che chen po rab tu brdung ba
dang chos bstan pa chen po mdzad par dgongs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag bdag ji ltar spobs pa dang/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'is ngas
rgyus rnams kyi snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di bdag gis mthong ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang/ 'od gzer gyi snang ba 'di btang bas/ bdag na 'di ltar de bzhin gshag
pa yang chos chenapo bsgrag pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par bzhed pa dang/ chos chen po bsgrags pa shes par mdzad bzhed pas/ 'di lta ba'i snga ltas 'damadzad pa na nyam byed do//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa 'a chos kyi rnam grangs bsgrag pa bzhed pas/ snga ltas cho
'phrulachen po 'od zer rab tu btang ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di ston to// rigs kyi bu dag bdag gis dran pa 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa grangs med pa la yang ches grangs/
chad pa yas pa dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ dpag gis mi lang ba tshad med pa// de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur ba/ de'i tshe de'i dusan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgronam zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung// des chos bstan pa tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge tsho/ bar du dge ba/ tha na ra dge
ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa// yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston te/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos rnams
sku la ni skyo ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sna sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang ! 'khrug pa las shan tu bzla ba'i phyir/
mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug nga/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan po/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'achos ston to// byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen ngo
rnams lan/ blan med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug nga 'a chos ston to/
rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag nga ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma'i rol gyi yang ches pha rol na yang de bzhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung ste/ ma pham pa 'di ltar snga rol dang starol brjod pa'i tshul 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag nga ra
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya bar mtshanagacig pa/ rigs dang gdung gcig pa sha stag ste// 'di ltar phyur dra dzI rigs su mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri byung ngo//
ma pham pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri po de dag thogam 'i de bzhin gshegs pa nas/ tham 'a de bzhani gshegs pa'i bar du de dag gis chos bshad pa ya nga tshangs nga ra spyod pa/ thog
mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ thamar dag ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ yongs su rdzogs pa// yongs su dag pa// yongs su byung ba/ yang dag par ston te/ 'di
lta ste/ nyan thos rnams lan skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las shin tu
da @#// bzla ba'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa// 'phags pa 'a bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa 'chos ston to// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa// thamA cad m khyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i
chos ston to// ma pham pa 'di ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ta zla sgron ma desngon gzhon nur gyur chung khab na bzhugs pa
las mngon par ma byung ba'i tshe/ sras brgyad yod par gyur ste/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal bu gzhonanu blo gros zhes bya ba dang/ bzang po'i blo gres dang/ mtha' yas blo gros dang/ dkon
mchog blo gros dang/ khyad par blo gros dang/ thatsomakun bcom dang/ dbyungs kyi blo gros dang/ rgyal bu gzhon nu chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/ ma pham pa bcom ldan 'das nyi zla

sgron ma de'i sras rgyal bu gzhon nu brgyad po de dag rdzu 'phrul chen por gyur te/ de dag re re yang gling chen po bzhi la kun tu longs spyod par gyur cing de dag na rgyal po byad do// de dag gis bcom
ldan 'das de khabanasamangon byung bar shes shing/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par thos nas/ rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad sngas te/
bcom ldan 'das de'i rjes su rab tu byung nas/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa na nga dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te chos sma kha ra gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag rtag tu
tshangs par spyod cing/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur to// ma pham pa de'i tshe na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma des/ nges nga ra bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sngapa/na du rgyus nga chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdan sa pa// sangs rgyas thams
kyis yongs su bzungs ba bshad nas/ de'atsho sadacag nga gi pud tsam de nyid la// 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du chos kyi gdan chen po de dag nyid la skyil mo krung nga nus te/ mtha' yas nges par ra
bstan pa 'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa ra zhugs te/ sku ma g.yo zhing sa nas mi gang bar gyur nas bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das desnyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/
bcom ldan 'das 'a ma togaman+da ra dang/ man+dar chen ngo dang/ maN+Dasha ko dang/ many+dzashaka chan ngo dang/ lha'i me tog dag gachar chen ngo na ngon par bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor
dang bcas pa la ma ngon nga ra 'thor ro// tham sa cad dang ldan pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg kun tu rang tuldeg/
'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// ma pham pa yang de'i tshe 'khor der dag slong dang/ dge slongam dang/ dag bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyanam dang/ lha dang/
kladang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yon dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang ma ma yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal phran dang/ stobs
kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams 'dusanas/ 'khod par gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing ngo mtshar du gyur/
rmad du gyur/ dga' bar gyur to/
de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs panyi zla sgron ma'i smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas/ 'od zer/
gcig byung nas/ de shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri byung// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang bar gyur te/ ma pham pa 'di lta ste
dparan/ da ltarasangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag snang bar gyur pa bzhinano// ma pham pa yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i zhamarangan byang chub sems dpa' bye ba drag te shu 'khod pa dang/ 'khor
'das de'i bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po 'od mchog ces bya ba byung su/ de'islob ma brgyad brgya yod do// bcom ldan 'das de yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/
byang chub sems dang 'a 'od mchog las brtsams te/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po 'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston te ba ra gyi bskal pa drug cu tshang bar gdan gcig la bzhugs nas/
sku ma skyod/ semasam g.yo bar bshad do// 'khor de dag thams cad kyang stan gcig la 'khod de/ lus mi bskyod ! sams mi g.yo bar par gyi bskal pa drug cur bcom ldan 'das
de la chos nyan te/ 'khor den sems can 'ga' yang lus ngal ba yang med/ sams skyo ba yang mad de// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgronams bar gyi bskal pa drug cu 'das kyi bar du ngan pa 'chos pad+ma dkar po 'a chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shan tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'/
rnams la gdams nga/ sas rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad nas// skad cig de nyid la mya ngan las 'da'o zhes lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa
dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i mdun du dge slong ngag de nabanam gyi gang thun 'a de bzhin gshegs pa phung po'i lhag mamed pa 'a mya ngan/
@#// las 'da' ba'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs so// ma pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgronam des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achan bo dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ blo named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nud du lung
bstananas/ 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i dpal gyi snying po 'danga' 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ ma
pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de'i nub mo nam gyi gung thun la phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan
las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// dam pa'achos pad+ma dkar bo'achos kyi rnam grangs de yang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mchog
awiya desazlas te/ bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bstan pa la yang dag par bstan to// ma pham pa de la bcom ldan 'das de'i sras blo
gros la sogs pa brgyad po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mtshog re'i slob mar gyur te/ des de dag bla na med nga ya[-]ga nga ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/
de dag gis de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bya ba khrug khrag brgya stong mang po mthong ste 3 bkur ngas byas nas de dag ra bcud: bla na me da nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de dag gi tha man de bzhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'isangs rgya[w]ya ma mdzad yanano// slob ma brgyad brgya po de dag las gcig
rnyed pa la rab tu gdu ba/ bkur sti la gdu ba/ shes kyi la la gdu ba/ grags pa 'dod pas de la gnas bstan pa'i tshig yig mi zin/ ma chags te/ de'i nang yang grags 'dod can
bya bar gyur to// des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mnyes par byas so// mnyes nga ra byas nas bsti stang byas/ btsun pa ra byas/ ri mor byas//
mchod pa dang/ bkur ba dang/ rim gro byas so// ma nga na nga de'atsha de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog nas bya ba chos sla bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin nga snyan du khyod ser nyi
'am yid gnyis samathatsom za bar gyur na de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ kho bo de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog ces bya ba chos sla bar gyur to// gang yang
byang chub sems dpa' grags 'dod ces bya ba le lecan du gyur pa de ni/ ma pham pa khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dusan/ byang chub sems dpa'i grags 'dod ces bya ba la/
'acan du gyur pa saMnano// ma pham pa de ltar kho bos rnam grangs 'dis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snga ltas 'dalta bu'i 'od zer btang ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang dam pa'i
chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po de bshad par bzhed pa snyam byed do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dond tad rgyas par ston
cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa// tshad med bsam gyis ma khyab bskal pan// de tshe rgyal ba byung ba skye dgu'i mchog/
mtshanan nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba// skyo dgu 'dren pa de na chos ston te// sems can mtha' yas bya ba rnam par 'dul/ khyang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas bye ba stong// mang po de
dag yang shas yang dag 'dzud// rnam par 'dren pa gzhon nur gyur pa la// de tshe de la sras gyur brgyud bo dag/ thubachen rab tu byung ba de mthong nas// 'dod pas thams cad myur
bar rab tu byung// 'jig rten mgon po de yis chos bshad pa/// mtha' yas nges par bstan pa mdo sde mchog/ doming shin tu rgyas pa'i sde zhes bya// srog chags stong khrag bye ba dag
la ston// rnam par 'dren pa de yis bshad ma thag/ de tshe skad cig skyil mo krung bcas na// mtha' yas nges bstan ting 'dzin dam pa la// thub mchog chos gdan bzhugs nas
bsam gtan mdzod// lha yi ma tog mnar ba 'bab// ma rungs par ni rnga la sgra yang 'byung// lha dang gnod sbyin bar snangaganas 'khod pa// rkang gnyis dam pa la namachod pa byed//
zhing rnams thams cad de ma thag tu g.yos// de na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'gyur// smin mtshams nas ni shin tumadzes pa yi// 'dris pas 'od gzer gcig pa rab btung ba//
shar gyi phyogs su 'od zer du song bas// zhing rnams stong phrag bco brgyad tshangs pa drug/ rab tu snang bas 'jig rten thams cad mdzes// sems can rnams kyi sha 'bo skye ba ston//
rnam par 'dren pa'i 'od gzer de yi mthus// de ltar don la la ramachan zhing// de bzhin kha dog baiDUrma la mdog/ bltan sdug pa sna tshogs snang bar gyur// lha dang me dang de bzhin/
gnod sbyin klu// lha sa bu mo dratham 'am ca// gang rnams bde bar gshegs la mchod brtson nga// de dag 'jig rten khams na mchod byed snang// sangs rgyas rang byung de dag nyid kyang
snang// gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu r bltan mdzes// be DUrlu yi dbus na gas gzugs bzhin// 'khor gyi dbus na chos ni rab tu gsung// de na nyan thos grangs yod ma yin te//
bde gshegs nyan thos de snyad tshadamed pa// so so'i zhing du rnam par 'dren pa la// 'od zer 'od kyis de dag thams cad ston// brtson 'grus ldan zhing tshul khrims ma/
nyams te// tshul khrims skyon 'danor bu natshan 'dra// mi mgon sras dag re yo ul dgan// gnas shing spyod pa de dag snang bar gyur// bdog pa thumasAtsadam lus yongs su gtong/
brtan po bzod pa'i stobs can bsam gtanadagag/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+ga'i bye snyad mang// 'od zer de yis thams cad rab tu snang// bskyod pa med cing g.yo bamed par snang//
bzod gnas bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam par gzhag/ de dag bsam gten byang chub mchog zhugs pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugasakyi sras rnams snang// yang
drag zhi ba zag pa med pa'i gnas// shin tu shas nas yang dag rab ston te// 'jig rten khams mang du ni chos kyang 'chad// de 'dra'i byed pa bde gshegs mthu yis 'byung//
nyim zla ba sgron ma de yamathus// skyong ba'i 'khor bzhis de dgamathong nas su// de tsho thamasacad dga' bar gnas gyur to// 'di lta ci zhig cesan phan tshun 'dra// gnod
sbyin lha mas de mchod ma ring bar// 'jig rten 'dren pa ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs// chos sgra byang chub sems dpa' gangamakhas pa// 'od mchog sras la de tsho 'di skad gsungs/
mkhas pa khyodan 'jig rtenamag dang lam// nga yi chos 'dzin shan tu yad brtan pa// ji ltar srogachags phan phyir ngas bshad pa// nga yi chosamadzod 'di la khyod mngon sum//
byang chub sems dpa' mang po kun bkod de// dga' bar byas shing shin tu bsngags bstod nas// bar gyis bsal pa druganu tshangs par na// de tshe rgyul ba de yasachos mchog
bshad// gdan gcig stangs bzhugs 'jig rten mgon po des// chos mchog dam pa dag ni gang bshad pa// de dag thams cad 'od mchog rgyal ba'i sras// chos par gyur
pa de yis shin tu bzung// rgyal ba desani chos kyinachog bshad do// skya bo du marab tu dga' byas nas// de yi rkyen par lhar bcas 'jig rten mdun/ rnam par 'dren pa de ni
'di skad gsungs// nga yis chos kyi tshul 'dirab bstan te// chos kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra bshad zin gyis// dge slong do nub nam gyi gung thun la// ngan mya ngan zla ba'i dus la bab//
nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab sbyor la// bag mdam yin dad pa sAng por gyis// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'das par yang// rgyal ba drang srong chen po red par dka'// rkang gnyis dam
ba shin tu myur bar du// mya ngan lasan zla ba'i sgra thosanas// sangs rgyas srasa rnams mang po mya ngan skyes// sdug bsngal rab dang shin tu ldan par gyur// srog chags bya mang bsam yas/
de dag la// ma yi dbang bo rgyal pos dbugs phyung ba// mya ngan nga 'das dag slong ma 'jigs shig/ nga yi 'og tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba na// byang chub sems dang/
dpal sAngamakhas pa 'di// zag med ye shes 'di na rtogs bar ragis// nga ya khyang chub mchog rab thob 'gyur te// sbyan dang yan lag dri nga rgyal bar 'ong// de tshodi yanam gyi gung
thun la// rgyu zad me dang 'dra ba myana'adas//de yi sku gdung shan tu rgyas 'gyur te// mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig mthA' yas so// den dge slong de bzhin dag slong ma// gang rnams byung
chub mchog la rab zhugs shing// bde gshigs de yi bstan la mngon brtson pa// de dag ma nyung gang+ga'i bye ma snyad// de tsho chos sbyar gang gyur dag slong ni// gang gis chos de
bzung ba 'od mchog ste// bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu tshang ba dor// bskal pa de la chos mchog rab tu ston// dri ya slob mar gyur pa brgyad brgya dag/ de dag thams cad yongs su
sAn par byas// de dag sangs rgyas bye ba mang bo mthong// drang srong chen po de dag bkur sti byas// de tsho spyadang rjes su mthun spyadanas// 'jig rten mang po khams su sangs
rgyas gyur// gcig 'og gcig bu de dag rjes bzhan du// byang chub mchog tu gcig gis gcig lung bstan// sangs rgyas de dag rim gyis byung ba yi// tha mar gyur pa ma ma mdzad/
0 pa ste// lha ya lha mchog drang srong mang bos mchod// srog chags bye ba stong yang rnam da ra btul/// gang sngon bde ba gshegs pa de yi sras// de yi tshon 'od mchog chos smra ba'i//
slobam srid dang ldan zhing le le can// shes kyi kha dang rnyed pa tshe' ba dang// shin tu ga u0f7a
kun/ de ya tsho na bshad pa rnams ma zin// de yi mang yang 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur// grags pa 'ded nas phyogs su rnam grags// de yang dge ba rnams kyi las de dag/ 'dren
mar gyur pa mngon par 'dus byas pas// sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mnyes byas te// de dag da khor pa rgyu mi sa 10 rjes sar shun nga 'i spyod pa rab spyad nas/ sangs
rgyas shAkya seng ge 'di yang mthong// den 'dir yang tha mar 'byung ba ste// sa bzhin byang chub mchog kyang theb 'gyu sa// byams pa'i rigs su bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur//
srog chags stong phrag bye ba rnam par 'dul// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la/ de tsho la 'a nand kang gya// de na de 'drar gyur ba khyod nyid do// de tshe chos smar
gyur pa kho bo ste// kho bos de dag de yargyu dang gzhas// ye shes grags pa de yi ltag phyung/ sngon tshe de na ngo me ga byur pa// de 'dra'i ltas 'di deng yang mthong bsan// nges
par rgyal ba'i dbang po kun tu spyan// shAkya'i rgyal chen don dam gzigs pas kyang// de'i tshe khe bsarnamagrus mchog thob gang// de dag nyid na'adisakyang bshad par
dgos// de la ltas nyid de rang yongs rdzogs kyi// rnam par 'dren ba rnams kyi thabasam/khas ba// shAkyasengags yang dag 'jogamadzad de// chos kyi dngos nyid phyag rgya stonapar gyur//
lamo sbyar tesems bzang brtson par gyis// 'jig rten phan zhing thugs rtse ston 'gyur te/ mtha' yas pa ya tshes kyi char ba 'bab/ gang dag byang chub phyir zhugs ngoms par mdzad//
byang chub sams dpa' byang chub phyarizhugs pa/ gang dag mkhas pa nyid las skyes gyurag/ de dag rnams kyi som nyid gang yin dang// 'di gnyis btsam gang yin de sel 'gyur//
dam pa'i chos bad+ma dkar bo'i chos kyi rnam grasul// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// kham po gnyis pa////de nas bcom ldan
'das dranab dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so// bzhisanas tshe dang ldan bshA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa
la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs su chud pa// sangs rgyas kyi mi shes na zab pa// mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba ste/ nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas/
thams cad kyis shes par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shAra'i bu de bzhanagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang
bo la bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pol/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad spyadang/ yun ring ponas rjes su zhugs
pa/ brtson 'grus mdzad mdzad pa sta/ ngomatshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan zhing shes par dka' ba'i chos rnams mkhyen pa'i phyir ro// shAra'i bu de bzhani gshegs ba dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ldem por dgongs te bshadapan sha bar dka' bgo/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rang gis rig pa'i chos rnams thabs mkhas pa dang/
ye shes mthong ba dang/ rgyud dang gzha ding dmagos pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ rnam par rig byed sna tshogs rnams kyis yang dag par ston te/ thabs mkhas ba de dang/
de bdag gis sems can de dang dol chags pa rnams rab tu 'grel ba'i phyir ro// shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasarnamAsan/ thabs
mkhas pa chen po dang/ ye shes mthong ba dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa 'o// shA ra'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnamasan chags pa med cing
thogs pa med pa 'a ya shes mthong ba dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ bstan
sku gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rmad du byung ba'i tshom rnam dang ldan te// chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'o// shA ri'i bu
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ngomatshar chen po b.ras pa'o// shAri'i bu de tsam gyis bshad pa chog par gyis shig/ nA'abu
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams na ngo mtshar mchog b.rAs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mkhyen pa'i chos de yang
de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'chad do// shA ra'i bu chos thams cad kyang de ngazhani gshigs pa nyid ston to/ chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs nga nyid kyis
mkhyenate/ chos de dag gang yin pa dang/ chos de dag ji lta bu yin pa dang/ chos de dgaca'adra ba dang/ chos de dgagamtshan nyid gang yin pa dang/ chos de dag ga ngo bo nyidi su yin pa dang/
chos de dag gang yin padang/ ji lta bu yin pa dang/ ci 'dra ba dang/ mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang/ ngo bo nyidi ci yin pa yang mkhyen to// de nas bcom ldan 'das donade nyid
ga rgyas par stonatsang/ de'atsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// lha mar bcas pa'i 'jig rtenand/ dpa' bo chen po dpagamadang// rnam 'dranasems can thams cad kyis//
rnam pa kun tu shes ma nus// de dgastobs dang rnam thar dang// 'jigs med gang dag ca'adra dang// sangs rgyas chos rnams ru 'drab// sus kyang shes par ma nus so// sas rgyas
bye ba'i gan dag na// zab cing shin tu phra ba dang// rig dka'amathong bar dka' ba yani// sbyod pa dgan sngan chad bsnyen// bskal pa bye ba bsam yasasu// spyod pa de dag spyad pa yi//
'bras bu de ni ci 'dra ba// byang chub snyang ngor samathong ngo// de ni 'jig rten rnam 'drenapa// gzhan dag dang ni ngas kyang de// ji lta yin dang ci 'dra dang// de yi mtshan nyid ci 'dra shes//
de na bstan du mnus te// den brjod du yong med de// mos pa lan gang gnas nga// byang chub sems dang ba ma gtogs par// gang 'a chos de bstan pa dang// bstan pa dag/
kye shes pa yi// de 'dra'i sems can su yang n// 'jig rten dag na yod ma yin// gang dag 'jig rtanamakhyen pa'i nyan thos pa// lhag par byas pa bad bar gshags ngas bsngags//
zag zad tham 'a'i sa 'dzin de dag gi/ yul ni rgyal ba'i ye shes 'ad la med// gal te 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad du// shAri'i bu gang 'dra bar de gyur te// gcig tu 'dus par gyur
thuglu/ nasarnam bsams kyang// de dag bde gshegs ya shasashesazhus//gal te khyod dang 'dra ba'amakhas rnams kyis// phyogs rnams btung char gang bar gyur pa dang/ dgang/
yang nga yanyan thos 'di gzhan rnams // de dag gis kyang de bzhin gang gyur te// de dag thams cad gcig tu dang 'dusanas// bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes rnam bsams kyang// tsatsam/
tshad med ye shes ngas shes pa// thams cad 'dus pas shes par mi nus so// zag pa med par gyur pa'i rang sangs rgyas// dbang po rno ba'i pha ma' lus 'dzin pas// ji ltar smig dang
'dam bu'i tshol bzhin du// phyogs bcu thams cad gang bar gyur pa dag/ gcig tu 'dus nas rnam par bsam byas kyang// nga yachos kyi mchog gi phyogs tsam yang// bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su// de yi yang dag donan yongs shes// byang chub sems dpa'i theg par gsar zhugs pa// sangs rgyas bya ba mang la bya ba byas/ shin tu
sa don chos sna mang po rnams // de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu gang gyur te// smog dang 'dam bu bzhin du'ajig rten kun// ba mtshamasamed par rtag tu gang gyur la// gcig tu
'dusanas rnam par sems byed cing// shes rab phra bas gzhan du mi sems par// bskal pa bya bamang po dpagamadang// gang+ga'i bye ma snyed du bsams byas kyang// chosagabade bar
gshegs pasamangon gzigs pa// 'di la de dag rnams kyi yul med do// phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang// mnyingagang+gA khyim snyad rnams kyis// gzhan du ma sems rnam par/
bsams byas kyang// dal de dag ga yang yulamed do// zabang shan tu phra ba'i chos rtogs shing// rtog pamed la thams cad zag med pa// phyogs bcu'a'ijig rten rgyal ba de dag dang// ngas ni/
'di na dedag ji 'dra shes// gzhan min gsung ba rgyal ba drang srong che// yun ring dus na mchog gi don 'chad kyis// bde bar gshegs pas gang bstan de 'ani// mos pa phun sum
tshogs byos shAri'i bu// nyan thes pa na 'di dgathams cad dang// rang sangs rgyas sun gang zhugs pa dang// mya ngan 'das la ngasani gang bkod cing// sdug bsngal rgud las yang dag
bkrol la bsgo// gang phyir 'jig rten du chos mang bshad// de dang de la chags pa rab bkrol zhing// theg pa gsum dag nye bar bstan pa ni// de dag nga la thabasaMmakhas mchog yin no//
de nas 'khor den kun shes ko'u danul sogs pa nyan thos chen po gang dag dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ stong nyis brgya dang gzhan yang gang dag
nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyenadang/ dge bsnyen ma dag dang/ gang yang rangs ngas rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad bde
@#// snyam dusams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhasapacher bsngags pa dang/ chos zabamo de yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes
h+pha gsung zhing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka'o zhes gsus pa'i rgyu na gang ga zhin ci zhig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par grol ba gcig go nas bka'
sul te/ bdag cagarnamasakyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'phros pa ma yin mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de'i don bdag cag gis ma rig
go snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i busa'akhor bzhi po de dag som nyid dang the tsom za bar rig ste/ sems kyi rnam par rtog bsems kyis shes nas/ bdaganyid
kyang chos la tho tsom za bar gyur to/ de'i tshibcom ldan 'dras la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs
mkhas pa mkhyen pa'i chos bstan pa yang dang yang bsngags pa mdzad pa dang/ chos zab mo ngas mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba dang/ ldem por dgongs te bshad pa yang
shes par dka'o zhes yang dang yang gasung pa'i gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu sngon chad ma bos te ! bcom ldan
bas 'das 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang bya tsom dang som nyi'atshalanadabazhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos khrab go yang dang yang gsung ba mdzad pa de/ bcom ldan
'das kyis legs par bshadadugasol/ de nas tshe dbaldan pa shA ri'i bus de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan dag/ dang tu
mad pa ngasathob ces// ring nas mi yinyi ma yi// dgadod bka'amachid 'di'odramadzad// khyodal zhu khamamachis pas/ byang chub snying bo 'barjod pa mdzad/ khyod la su'ang me shu/
bar: rnaldem bor dgongs te bshadapamadzod// ma zhus par ni gsung mdzad de// nyid kyisong pa bsngags pa mdzad// ye shes brnyes pa brjodamadzad cing/ zab mo dag kyang ba
bshadapas/ dbang ldan gyur cing zag med pa// mya ngan 'das pa gang zhugs rnams // rgyal ba cig gsung snyam ste/ de'ang 'di dag the tsom gyur/ rang rgyal byang chub gang 'tshal
ba/ dge slo de bzhin dgeslong ga// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// lto 'phyachodang dri za dag/ blo tsam 'tshal zhing rnam sems te// de dag phan tshunamamatshizhing// rkangaganyis mchog la
rab ldan// thub pa chen po lung bstan gsol// khode bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams // 'di na ji snyid mches pa kun// de yin na bdag mchog cos// drang srong mchog gis bstan lags na//
mi yi gtso bo nyidakyi gnas// 'di la bdag kyang btsom 'tshal/ mya ngan 'das thar bangag phyinatam// 'on te bdag la spyod bstan tam// rdzamchog dbyangs kyis
rab rtagasung phyung ste// chos 'di ji lta lags pa bshad du gsol// rgyal sras thugs sras mchis pa 'di dag rnams // thal mo sbyarab bgyis nas rgyal blta// lha dang klu dang gnod
sbyin srin por bcas// bye bstong phrag gang+ga'i byakha snyad/ byang chub mchog 'di'atshalab gang lags pa// brgyad khri tshang bar gang mchis de dag dang// sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
po gang// bya bstong gi zhing nas lhags pa dag/ spyod ba ji ltar yongs su rdzogs bgyi zhes// thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par mchis/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'asalato// shA ri'i bu don 'di bshadabasaci zhigakhya/ da ci'i phyir zhen/ shAri'i bu don 'di bshadan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig/
rten 'di dngas b.ra'agyur ro// yang tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das lalan gnyis su gsol ba btab pa/ don 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshen
ba bshad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor de nasrog chags brgya phrag mang po/ srog chags stong phrag mang po/ srog rlags brgya stong phrag mang po//
mtha srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag mang po son gyi sangs rgyasamathong ba/ shes
dang ! 'dzin par 'gyur ba mchis so/ 'a danas po'i tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i busatshigs subacad pa 'di gsolato// srog chagang skyong rnams 'khor na mchis pa dag
dadadaga'abad bar gshogasal gus paste// khyokyis chos bstan de dag 'tshol bar 'gyur// mi dbang rgyal bo gsal bar bshad du gsol/ donas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu la lanaganyis su yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad pas ci zhig bya// shAri'i bu don 'di bshadan lha dang bcas
pa'i 'jig rtena'adi dngangs bar 'gyur te// ye slong lhag ba'i nga rgyalacan du gyur ba rnams // g.yang sa chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bkaM'asul to// nga yi chos 'di bshadapas chog/ ye shes 'diphubartag mi nus// byis ba mnga'akhodang rgyal can// nga yi chos bshad mi shes
slong// da nas tsho dang ldan po shAri'ibus/ bcom ldan 'ongs 'akan gsum du yang gsol ba btab pa/ don 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar
gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'din bdag dang 'dra ba brgya phragamang du mchis so// bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya phragamang po/
srogachags stong phrag mang bo/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang bo/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi srid pa dag na/ yongs su
sIn par mdzad pa gzhan dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la dad par 'gyur/ yid ches par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur// de yang de dag gi yun ring po'i
don dang sA na pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dago paNasol to// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gis chos bshad/
gsol// khyod la sras kyi thub bo bdag gsol pa// 'din srog chags bye ba stongamachis pa// de dag khyod kyisachos bshad 'di dad 'gyur// sngon gyi srid pa rnams su khyod
kyis gong// yun ring rtagatusems canasnyen mdzad pa// de kun thal mo sbyar ta'adi na mchis// de dag chos 'di la ni dad par 'gyur// bdag 'dra brgya phrag bcu gnyis 'di dgadang/
gang dag byang chub mchog zhugs pa dag/ de la gzigs nas bder gshigs rab bshad de// de dag dga' mchog kyang bskyad du gsol/ nas bcom ldan
a 'das kyisatshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lanagasum du gsol babatab pamkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' sul to// gshare'i bu 'di ltar ngu bzhin gshegs pa la lan
gsum gyi bar du gsol ba 'debs na/ shA ri'i bu de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa khyod la dziskad byas/ sha ri'i bu pa'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shigadang ngas khyod la bshad
do/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' su:lam thag tu/ 'khor de nas dge slong dang/ dge slongam dang/ dge bsnyenadang/ dge bsnyenam lcag ba'i nga rgyal can lnga stong stan las
langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tu 'khor de nas dong ngo// 'di ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gyis dge ba'i ma thob par ni thob par 'du shes/
khong du ma chud par ni khong du chud par shes pa de dag rang gi skyon shes te/ 'khor de nas dong ba la bcom ldan 'dasakyis cangami gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu nga'i 'khor shin tamu med par gyur to/ shA ri'i bu snying po ma yin pa mad par gyural/ dad
pa'i snying po la gnas te/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can de dag dong ba yang legs so// shA'i 'i bu de lta bas na de'i donapaMshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/shA ri'i bu bcos
ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni brgyal res 'galazhig 'di lta bu yi chos
bstan pa gsung ngo// 'di lta ste dparan/ u dum wA ra'i tshal ni bal res 'ga' 'byung// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang brgyal res 'galazhig chos bstan pa 'di lta
bu gsung ngo// shAri'i bu nga la yid ches par gyis shig/ ni bden par sa ba'o// ngan song dag par s ba'o// zhigazhan ma yin par sa pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhinagashegs pa'i ldem por
dgos tabashad pa'i don khong du chud par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu ngas sa pa'i tshig dang bstan pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ dpa sna tshogs dang/ thabs la mkhas pa rnam
ba brgya stong dag gis chos rab tu bshadapa ni rtag tu med cing rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir te/ shAri'i bu chos de ni dbazhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'o// de ci'i phyir
zhen shA ri'i bu bya ba gcig dang byed pa gcig dang/ byab chenA bo dang/ byed pachen po'i phyir bya ba gang dang byed pa gang gis de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba gcig bo dang/ byed pa gcig po dang/ bya ba chen po dang/ byed pa chen po dang/ bya ba gang dang/
byed pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung po gang zhe na/ nga nisams can rnams de bzhinagashegs pa'i ye shes mthong/
ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzung ba'i rgyu'i phyir/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'isangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// sams can rnams la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par bstan pa'i rgya'i phyir/ de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// sems
can rnams la de bzhin gangashegs pa'i la shes mthong ba la gzhug pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo//
sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i khong du chud par bya ba'i rgya'i phyir/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is sa rgyas 'jig rten
du'abyung ngo// sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam du gzuTaM ba'i rgyu'i phyir/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'jig rten du 'byung// shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba ga/cig po dang/ byed pa gcig po dang/ bya ba chen po dang/ byed pa chen po dang/ 'jig rten du 'byung pa'i dgos
bya/ @#// pagag pa 'o// shAri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba gcig po dang/ byed pa gcig po dang/ bya ba chen po dang/ byedab chen po de de bzhin gshegs pa/
mdzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ngani de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du'ajug pa'o// shA ri'i bu ngani de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang
dag par son pa'o// shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yegs shes mthong ba la 'jug par byed pa'o// shA ri'ibu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba khong du chud par byed
ba'o// shA ri'i bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shesamathong ba'i lam du 'dzud pa'o// shA ri'i bu nga yang theg pa gcig las brtsams te/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di
lta stasangs rgyas kyi theg pa zams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste theg pa gnyis sam gsum zhes bya bgang yang med do// shAri'i bu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad n yang
chos nyid ni 'di'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'des pa'i dusan/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham
dpag tu med grangs mad pa rnams su byung ste/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang/ khoms dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ skye bomang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo
mang bo la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ skya bo phal po che dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dadabang ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang//
rgya dang gzhi dang dpa dang/ dmigs pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ chos bstan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang shu
ri'i bu thog pa gcig labartsamasanas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ de yang 'di ltarasangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ gang 'di sems
can rnams de bzhinagashegs pa'i ye shesamathong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shesamathong ba nyid ston pa/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i ya shesamathong
ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/ de bzhinagashegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug pa
byed pa'i chos stonato/ shA ri'i bu 'os pa'i da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la sems can gang dag gis/ chos dathos pa de dag thams
cad kyang bu namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasadapag ngumang grangs med pa rnams su de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'asargyas gang dag 'byukha/ sams can mos pa tha dad pa dang/ bsam pa dang/ khams tha dad pa rnams kyi
bsam pa mkhyen nas/ skye bo mang bo la phan pa dang/ skye bomang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snyidabasdu bo dang/ skya ba phal po tsha dang/ lhadaminam sa kyi don dang phan pa dang/ bde
ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang/ rgyudangagazhi dang dang dang dmigs pa dang/ sa pa'i tshig dang/ thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogasakyisachos ston par 'gyur ba'i
zlo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang/ ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas/ sams can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur to/ de yang 'di ltar songs/
rgyas kyi thog pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ gaba'adisams can rnams dbazhin gshegs pa'i ya shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ dbazhin/
gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston ba/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i ye shesamathong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par
byed pa// sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthongab nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas de dag las sams can gang dag chos 'di nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i
bud ltar byung ba'i dus na/ phyogasabacule'ajig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasagang dag bzhugs
te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa/ soms can mos pa tha dad pa dang/ khams drang/ bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bad
ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtsa ba dang/ skyabo phal po che dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phanapa dang/ bde ba'i phyir sna tshogasamangon par basgrub pa bstan pa dang/ rgyu dang
gzhi dang dpa dang dmigs pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang/ ri'i bu theg pa
gcig las brtsamasanas/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamathar thug pa ste/ gang 'disams can rnams de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yi shes na thong nga nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i so shes mthong ba nyid ston pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed
pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong nyid khong du chud par byed ba/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par
wA byed pa'ichosaston te/ shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas de dag las sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas nga yang sems can mos pa tha dad pa//
ny+nyo dang ! khams dang/ bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyenanas/ skya bo mang po la bde ba dang/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ skya bo/
phal po che dang/ lha dang mirnamasakyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bad ba'i phyir/ sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang/ rgyu dang gzhi dang dpa dang dmigs pa dang/ nges
pa'i tshig dang/ thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyisachos ston to// shAri'i bu nga yang theg pa gcig laso brtsams nas sams can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ltar sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/ gang 'disamasacan rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ de bzhin gsheg
pa'i ye shesamathong ba nyid ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byedapa/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/ sems can/
rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shesamathongab nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/ shAri'ibu sems can gang dag da ltar nga la 'di ltar chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bran mo da
pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyuraro// ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltarig par bya ste/ 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang na yang theg pa gnyis su gdags
pa yang mdan/ gsum ltagal yod/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyasanam bskal pa'i snyigs ma las byung ngam/ sems can gyi snyigs
ma 'am/ nyonamos pa'i snyigs ma 'am/ lta ba'i snyigasama'am/ tshe'i snyigasam las byunas/ shAri'i bu 'di lta bu r bsal pa dang/ 'khrug pa'i snyigs ma dang/ drim
mang po dang/ brkam pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba 'i tshi/ ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thabs mkhas pas sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa gcig po de las theg pa gsum du bshad de bstan to// shA ri'i bu de ltar gang nyan thos sam/ gra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bya ba sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la mi nyan mi 'jug/ khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma
yin par rig par bya'o// dgra bcom pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyang ma yin par rig bar bya'o// shAri'i bu yang dge slong ma dge slong ma la la dgra bcom par khas 'che zhing/
blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bu chub tu smon lam yongs su mi 'dzin te/ nganisangs rgyas kyi theg pa bcad pa'o// zhes zer zhing nga'i lus 'di tham mu ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes
zer bani/ shA ri'i bu de lhag pa 'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pamangon sum du gyur te/
chos 'di thos nas dad par mi 'gyur ba'i go skabs med cing gnas ma yin te/ dbazhin gshegs pa yongs su mya don las 'das pani ma gtogaso// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu de
bzhin gshegs ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ mdo 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang pa'i nyan thosami 'byung ste/ shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan dag las sa'adi lathe tsom med par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu nga la dad par gyis shig/ yid ches par gyis shig/ rtogs par gyis shig/
shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la brdzun du smra ba med de/ shAri'i bu theg pa 'di ni gcig tu zad de/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyasakyi theg pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan
'das don de nyid rgyas par stonacing/ de'i tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// nga rgyal can gyi dge slongadang// dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang// dge bsnyanam rnams ma
dad pa// lnga stong las ni mi nyung ba// bslab pa zhig la'aldan pa rnams // zhes pa 'di dag mthong gyur nas// son rnams yongs su spyod pa'i phyir// byis pa'i blo can de dag dong//
gang gis chos 'di nyan par 'gyur ba yi// de dag la ni dag ba de med de// 'khor gyi snyim nyid mkhyon nas su// 'jig rten mgon po ngas kyang bsal ba yi// nga yi 'khor ni legs
par 'khod// shun pa med cing dag pa ste// snying pom yin kun madagyur// 'di dag snying por rab zhuganas// sus bu dam pa skyob pa sangs rgyas dag/ thabs la mkhas pa rgya
phrag dum yis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chosan du gsung ba// ci 'dri las nyon cig shari'i bu// de dag spyod pa bsam pa ci 'dra'angamakhyen// srog chags bye bamang po 'dod pa// /
de dag sngon chad dag ba tu byas dang// las rnams snyatshogs dag ni mkhyen nas su// nges pa'i tshig dngagazhi rnams sna tshogs kyi// srog chags de dag khong du chud par byed// ngas ni rgyu dang
dpe yang brgya dag gis// sems can lta de ltamagu bar bas// mdo sde de bzhin tshigs su bcad pa'ang bshad// de lta byung dang skye rabs rmad byung dang// glengag zhid bzhin/
gtan la bab pa dang// dbyangs bsad dpa ba snatshogasa rnams kyis bshad// ma mkhas gang dag dmanalamangon dga' zhing// sangs rgyas bye bamang ba spyod pa spyad// 'khor ba chags shing
shin stagabasngal ba/ do lamya ngan 'da' bar nye bar bstan// sangs rgyas ye shes rab rtogs bya'i phyir// daltarar 'byung ba ni thabs mdzadad// khyed cag sangs rgyas su yang 'grub po zhes//
da rnams lor shigami gsungs so// ci phyir zhe na spyod pa dus la gzhes// dal ba gzigs te nganas 'dod chagasado// dal ba don brgya la deng thob pas// daphyir yang dag nges pa 'dir bshad do//
rdzong yi bstan pa yan lag dgu po yang// sems can dag gi mthudang stobs las bshad// 'diltar thabs kyis mchog sbyin ye shes la// rab tugathud pa'i phyir na ngas bshado// gang dag
rtagar rnam par dag gyur pa// gsal gtsangarab tu des pa sangs rgyas sras// sangs rgyas bye ba mang la lhag byas pa// dag la ni rab rgyas mdo rnams bshad// 'di ltar 'di dag bsam pa
rdzogs pa dang// rnam par dag pa'i tshul dang ldan gyur pa// de dag lanam 'ongs dusan yang// phan zhing brtse ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes gsung// thos nas 'gro mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur
snyam ste// thamasacad shinat+tadaga' bas khyab par 'gyur// dag spyod pa rnams kyang sa shes nas// shin tu rgyas pa'amango se 'batu bshad// 'di ltar 'dren pa'i nyan thos de dag la// gang
gang yi bstan pa 'di thos pa// tshigs bcad cig tsam thos sam gzungs dang// thams cad the tsom med pa la bang rlung/ raM:/ thog pa tha dad par ni gang ston pa// sa mchoga rnams kyi
thabs mkhas ma gtogs par// theg pa gcigs gnyis su yod yani/ 'jig rtanan ninam yang gsum dusad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ya shes bstan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten du ya nga
jig rten mgon po 'byung// bya ba gcig gnyis su yod ma yin// sangs rgyas theg pa dman pas me 'dran// rang 'byung zhing ci la gnas pa dang// sangs rgyas ji lta bu dang ci 'dra ba//
stobs dang bsam gtan rnam thar dbang po rnams // de dag nyid la sems can rab tu 'jog/ byang chub rdul mad dam pa thob nas su// theg pa dman la sems can gcig bkodan// 'di'i nga yi
legs ma yin te// ser sna'i nyes pa'ang nga la yod par 'gyur// nga la sar snyadag ni cung zad mod// ngalaM phrag dog med cing 'dod chagasamad// sdig pa'i chos rnams thams cong ngas bshad de/
de phyir 'gro brtogs pas nga sangs rgyas// ji ltar mtshan rnams kyisan nga brgyan to// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rab snangabyed/ srog chags brgya phrag dumasamadun ltas shing// chos kyi rang
bzhin phyag rgya 'di bshad do// ngani 'disnyam sems te'i// sum cu rtsa gnyisamtshanagyigazugs ldan zhing// bga'od rang 'byung 'jig nag pa yang/ de ltar ci
nas sems can kun 'gyur snyam/ jiltar mthong zhing ji lta bsamab dang/ nga yi sngan chadajiltar parnags pad// nga yi smon 'a ma de dag yongs rdzogs te// byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni ma bstan
sems can rnams la byang chub 'dun skad ces// sani de skad smras nangashAri'i bu/ mi shes sems can rnams ni 'dir mos te// nga yis legs bshad 'dzin pagazhag mi 'gyug
rgyu de dag 'di 'dra'i tshul du ngas shes te// tshe rabs snga mar spyod pa rnams ma sbyang// 'dod pa'i yon tana rnams la chags shing zhen// srid pas rgyal zhing gti mug mos pa rnams // de dag
'dod rgyus ngan 'gror rab tu ltung// 'grob drug kun gyis nyon mongs te// dur khrod de dag phyi phyir 'phal bar byed// bsod nams chus pa sdug bsngal kun gyis gzir// lta ba'i thibs
por rtagotu rnam par chags// yod dang med dang do bzhin yod mod la// ltar gyur drug cu gnyis la brtenanas su// dngos po mda' yongs su 'dzin cing gnas// sbyang bar dka' zhing log
byedang rgyal can// byis pa thosanyung son po ga yo byad rnams // tshe rabs bye ba phrag stong nam du yang// de dag sangs rgyas sgra 'dim thos so// nga yi thabs kyis do lashAri'i bu// sdug bsngal
mthar phyung shig ces de skadasas/ sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong bas na// dedag ngan 'das pa da bar bstan// 'di ltar ngasani chos rnams 'di dag kun// gdod nas rab zhim//
ngan rtaga'angasabashad// sangs rgyas sras de spyod po kun rdzogs nas// ma'i dus kyi tshilargyal ba'agyur// theg pa gsum du ganga rnams bstan pa ni// nga la thabs mkhasatshulani/
de'adzas// theg pa gcig ste de bzhin tshul yang gacig/ de ltar 'dren pa rnams kyis bshad pa gcig/ gang 'dir la laze tsom yod pa dag/ the tsom ba dang de bzhin somanyid spongs//
gzhan du ma gsungs 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams // theg pa 'di na gcig ste gnyis su med// sngon gyi dang zhin gshegs pa gang byung ba// sangs rgyas stongam nga ma ngan yongs 'das shing//
'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs mdal// grang dgatshangani nam yang yong med pa// skyes bu dam pa de dag thams cad kyis// dab dang gzhi dang rgyu dang bcas pa dang// thabs la mkhas pa
brgya phrag dum yis// rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams rab bshadang// de dag thams cad theg pa gcig ston cing// srog chags stong phrag bye babason lasa rnams // theg pa gcig bu la
ya nga rab 'dzud de// theg pa gcig la yongasasu smin par byed// mos dang de bzhin bsam pa rnamasamkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas lhar bcas 'jig rten du// rgyal ba'i thabs
klu// gzhan rnam pamang bo dag/ gang gis chos mchog 'di ni rab bstanapa// sems can gang gis las mngonasumador// chos nyan pa dang 'on tathos ldan pa// srin pa/
sprin zheng tshul khrims rtsod pa dang// bzodang sa spyod pa thams cad bsgrubs pa dang// brtson 'grus bsam gtan lhag par byas pa dang// shes bkyis ni chos 'di rnams bsams te//
rnam pa dad pa bsod nams sus byas pa// de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur// mya ngan 'dus pa'i rgyal ba da drag gis// bstan pa de la sams can gang zhugs de// don bzod
cingazhi la dul ba ni// de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur// rgyal ba mya ngan 'as pa de dag gi/ rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag las su mchod cing// rin chen mchod rten stong phrag du ma
dang/ gsor dang dngul dang 'on te shel gyis 'tsho// rdo'i snying pomachod rten dag gis byas// bzhurma mchog de bzhin an d+harnyil// la las mu tig ga ke ru las byas// di dag gis
kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang gis mchod rten rdo las byas pa dang// gang gis a ga ru dang tsan dananam// gang gis thang shing mchod na byas pa dang// la las shingamang
gzhan las byas pa dang// sa dang so phag lasan brtsigs pa yi// rgyal ba mchod rten dga' bzhin byas pa dang// de phyir sa rdul phung bo dag las kyang// mya ngan dgon pa dag tu byas
can/ ba dang// byis pa'i dmor ded de de dag tu// gang gis rgyal ba de phyiramachod rten dag/ bye ma las ni phung po byas pa yang// da rnams kyis kyang byang chub thob par gyur// la las de bzhin
rin chen gzugs byas pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzugs// gang gis de phyir byas pa de dag kyang// de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur// la las derani na chen sna
bdun dang// lalas de bzhin zangs dgakharab las// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas pa// de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur// ro tre dang ne'u gsasam sa
yang rung// bde b.rig shegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas te// bltan sdug pa 'jim pa las byed bcug/ de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur// gang gis rtsig ngos gzugs kyi
ri mo dag/ bsod nams brgyamtshan yongs surdzogs pa'i sku// bdag gis bris sam 'drir bcugakyang rung// de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur// skyes bu dag gam 'on te gzhon nu'ang rung//
gang dag la la don slob ba'i tshe// rtsa dmo dga' dang bsang ba byed pan// rtsig ngos sen mo sheng bus gzugs bris pa// de dag thams cad byang chub thob gyur to// de dag thams cad snying rje
can du 'gyur// thams cad kyang ni srog chags bye ba sgrol// byang chub sems dpa' mang bo yang dag 'dzud// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ring bsrel dang// 'jim pa'i gzugs
dang mchod rten dgala'ang rung// rtsig ngos bris dang rdul phungamachod rten la// dal ma tog dang ni gos gsol to// der ni gang gis sgra snyan cang te'u dang// dung dang na rol

s+sa mo'i sgra byed bcug/ byang chub mchog rab mchod par bya ba'i phyir// gang dag rnams rab tu rdung byedacing// pi wang dang ni yig dang khaba'i rdza// rdza rtsa rgyud gcig gling bu yid 'ong dang// ako nad
rab tu snyan 'byin pa// dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa rnams lamachod pa'iphyir// gang dag lugs kyi sil khrol rdung bcug dang// chu la brdabs dang thul
zla mos brdabs pa dang// yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i glu blangs dang// ring bsrel de dag nam mang mchod byas pa// de dag thams cad 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// bde gshegs ring bsrel
lanang zad dang// sil snyan gcig brdungs pa yi sgra byung ngam// ma rtog gcig tsam gyisani mchod pa dang// bdagashegs gzugs dag rtsig ngos bris po la// 'khrug bzhin pa la sems
kyis mchod na yang// de dag rim gyis sangs rgyas bye ba mthong// mchod rten de la gang gis thalamo sbyar// yongs su tshang ba'am thalamo ya gcig gam// yang na mgo bo skad cig btud
pa dang// de bzhin lan cig lus kyang batud pa dang// gang gis ring bsrel a gnas pa de dag la// g.yengs pa'i sams kyis phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas zhes// tshig gcig lan
'ga' brjod par byas pa yang// do dab/kun gyis byang chub mchog 'di thob// de tshe bde bar gshegs pa de dag ni// mya ngan 'das sam yang na bzhugs kyang rung// sems canag ngagis chos 'di'i
ming thos pa// de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur// phyis 'byung sangs rgyas bye ba mang bo rnams // de dag bsam gyisami khyab tshad kyang med// 'jig rten dgon mchog rgyal ba de dag
kyang// thabs 'di rnams reb tu ston par 'gyur// gang gis sangs rgyas ye shes zag med pa/ 'di la srog chags bye ba 'dul mdzad pa// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa de dag gi/ thugs la
ma khas ba dag ni mtha'ags 'gyur// chos 'di thos nas sangs rgyas ma 'gyurab// sems can de duganam gcig kyang med// byang chub phyir sanganasan spyod par gzhag/ de ni de bzhin gshegs
rnams smon lamano// chos sgo byob stong phrag dum gu/ ma 'ongs dus na rab tu stona'agyur te// theg pa gcig po 'dinamangon ston cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du chos ston 'gyur/
chos kyi tshul 'di rtag tu gnas pa dang// chos kyi rang bzhin rtag 'od gsal bar// rkang gnyis dam ba sa ngas rgyas rnams mkhyen nas// nga yi theg pagacigaces ston par 'gyur// chos kyi
gnas nyid skyon med chos nyidan/ 'jig rten 'di na rtag tu mi g.yo gnas// sa yi snying por byang chub sangs rgyas te// thabs la mkhas pa shin tu ston par 'gyur// lha mi rnamasakyi mtshod
[r} ]bya// pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // phyogs bcur bzhugs pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyad// 'din srog chags thams cad bad ba'i phyir/ de dag rnams kyang theg pa mchog 'di 'chad// zhib
sachog 'di ni sangs rgyasanas// thabs lamakhas pas rab tu ston mdzad cing/ thog pa rnam pa tha dadamangon par 'chad// theg pa gcog po'ang yongs su ston mdzad do// lus can kun gyi spyod pa
rig pa dang// de bzhin sngon chad ji bsgoms ji bsams pa// de yi mthu dang brtson 'grus rnamasakyang rig/ shin tu dad pa mkhyen nas rab tu ston// 'dren pa yi shes stobs kyis rgyumang

sgyu dang/ da po dang gzhi yang mang por rab ston te// sems can mos pa sna tshogs rig nasan// snatshogasamangon par bsgrub pa nye bar ston// da ltar rgyal dbang 'dran pa nga yani// sems can rnams la bde
ba'i phyir byung ste// sna tshogs bsgrub pa bye ba phrag stongagis// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yang dag bstan// srog chags rnams kyi mos dang bsam mkhyen nas// chos rnams rnam pa mang por rab
bshaded/ rnam pa sna tshogs thabasokyis dga' ba bskyed// de ni da yi rang rig ye shes stobs// nga yisamathongab sems can dbul po rnams // shes rab bsod nams rnams dang bral gyur cing//
'khorab r bying lam ngan zhugs pa rnams // sdug bsngal rgyud du shin tu nub pa ste// srid pas chags pag yag gi rnga ma bzhin// 'dod pas 'di dag rtag tu ltos par byas// sangs rgyas mthu chen rna/

[/]kya'atshol zhing// sdug bsngalamatha ni 'groba'i chosami tshol// 'gro ba drug po rnamasasu zin nga 'isoms// log pamathod pa'i ltar mi g.yo ba nas// sdug bsngal ba yi sdug bsngal rab myong ba// de la/
nga yi snying rje stobs ldan te// byang chub snying po ni nga sems shing// 'bum phragagasum du tshang bar rab gnas te// ngani 'di 'dra'i don la rab sems shing// dan sdong po de la bltas pa ni// shing
mchog del mgami 'dzums par b lta/ de yi drung na phan tshun 'chag cing gnas// ye shes de ni dam pa ngomatsharate// sems can 'di dag mi mkhas gtimug ldongs// de tshe nga latshas dang brgya
byin dang// dbang phyugs tsho dang 'jig rten skyong bzhi dang// dong zhin dbang phyug dag kyang gsol 'debs te// lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang bo yang// thums cad thalamo sbyar nas gus por 'khod//
dona rnams ji ltar bya ba rab bsams// nga yis byang chub 'on tanabasngagos na ni// sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal gzir ba ste// nga yi chos la byis pa'i blo can skur// de ltar sku pas na
song gnas su 'gro// sa ni mong ma bshadan dge ro 'gyur gyis// nga dang zhi bar mya ngan 'das bla snyam// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang de dag gi/ thabasamakhas ji ltab pa nga rab dranati// sa
kyang 'di ltarasangs rgyas byang chub 'di/ rnam pa gsum du 'dir phyi rab tu bshad// nga yis don de de ltar bsams pan// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gzhan gyis kyang// de dag rang gi
lus kyang ng bstananas// legs zhes bya ba'i sgra pa nga rab bsgrags te// thub pa 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog/ dranam da nga 'i ye shes 'di rtogs nas// thabs la
