dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing zhes pa der/ de pad+ma'i snying bo'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro// de 'dod chag kyi gzir
bar mi 'gyur te/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ gnod sems kyis ma yin/ de/
skas ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzodapa yang thob par 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems/
dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyad mthong bar 'gyur// mig gis dbang bo yongs su dag pa/
gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar de'i mig gi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de la legs so zhig
bya ba spen pa ra 'gyur te/ gang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyis rnam grang 'di thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas shakya thub pa de'i gsung rab la lung mnos pa dang/ kha ton byas pa dang/ bsgoms pa dang/ bsams pa dang/ yid la byas pa dang/ sems can gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa
rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mas tshig pa 'am/ chus khyer bar mi nus so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ba songanams
mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni/ sas rgyas brgya stong gis kyang bshad par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdud kyi phyir rgol ba bcom mo// srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal to// dgra'i tsher ma
dgas so// sa ngas rgyas brgya stong gis byin gyis brlabs so// rigs kyi bu lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten khyod rang 'dra ba med do// de la zhin gshegs pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan/
nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang khyod la bsod nams kyis kyang rung/ ma shes kyis kyang rung/ shes rab kyis kyang rung/ ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang rung ste/
zil gyis gnon par mi nus so// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po de e shes kyi stobs bskyod pa 'di lta bu thob par
'gyur ro// skar ma'i rgyal po ma rtog kun tu rgyas ba mngon par shes pa gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa thos nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i kha nas ut+pa
pa'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i lus las kyang tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i chos can gyi yon tan gyi/
phan yon de dag na ngas da ltar gang dag phashad pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rgyal bo me tog kun tu rgyus pa mngon par shes pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sems can thams cad kyi mthong na dga' ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di nas phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na spyod chung nub par mi 'gyur
ba dang/ bdud sdig can gyis glags mi red pa dang/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ grul bum rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la yongs su
zla gtad do// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de lta bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu gling 'di sems can nad kyis btab pa rnams la sman lta bu r 'gyur bar byen/
gyis brlab par bya ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thosanas lus la nad kyis mi zug go/ rga bas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chebs ma yin no// sar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
mngon pa shes pa gal to/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la las mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dge slong de lta bu de mthong na de la tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ ut+pal sngon
pos mngon par gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtong nas kyang 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'di na rtswa len par 'gyur/ 'di ni byang chub kyi seng
por rtsa 'ding bar 'gyur/ 'di ni bdud kyi phyogs pham par byed par 'gyur/ 'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur/ 'di ni chos kyi nga rdung bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'khor ba'i rgyamatsho las rgal
bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// skar ma'i rgyal po ma rtog kun tu rgyus pa mngon par shes pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ ribs kyi bumo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par/
zhugs pas mde sngo 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong nas/ de ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ de ltarin de'i yon tan dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci 'dra ba dag bshad pa dag tu
'gyur ro// sman gyi rgyal po sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sgra thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rin chen mang des kyang/ skar ma'i rgyal po ma tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di ltar khyod kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi chos dris pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gas pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sminamatshamasakyi

mdzod spu nas 'od byung ste/ 'od desangasher phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag g+hAng+gA'i klung bco brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag
khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung bco brgyad kyi bye ma snyed de dag 'dus pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub
sems dpa'i dge 'dun rgya chen po tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
tsho dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des mdzad nas 'od gang btang ba de'i cho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snangaba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de snang bachen pos khyab par gyur
( to 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sang sang ngo 'dabyungs zhes bya ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ 1 sngon yang de bzhin gshegs
zla pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i 'od zer de lta bu mdzepazhing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po sang sang bo'i dbyangs kyi ting nge 'dzin mang po
thob pa 'di lta ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin theb dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ dri ma med pas byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ skar
sa ma'irgyal pornam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ rlung lha'i bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob ye shes kyiphyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ sgra thams cad la mkhas
pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ bsod nams thams cad kun las bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ dad pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rel pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ ye shes
tu la la'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ bkod pa'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thub/ dri mamed pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ dri mamed pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ zad par chub pa/
ting nge 'dzin thob/ rimalikhor ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
ba la klung gi bye ma snyad kyi bar du thob ba 'dug ste/ !byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangasang po'i dbyas de'i lus la 'od des phog par gyur to// de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po ma tog kun tu rgyas pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang blta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' smanagyi rgyal po de yang blta ba
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin pa de yang blta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas par mngon par shes pa de yang blta ba dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' spyod pa khyad par can de yang blta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po de yang blta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sman yang dag 'phags de yang bal ba'i slad du/
@# 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa
ts+tsa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khamA
mi mjed der song ste phyin nas ngan pa'i 'du shes bskyodapar mi bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mthon dman can dang/ sa las grub pa dang/ ri nag pos gang ba dang//
'jig ngan gyis yongs su gang ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang sku thung ngo// byang chub sems dpa'/
sams dpa' chen po de dag kyang lus thung ngo// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lus thob pa na depa ga tshad bzhi khri nyis stong ngo// rigs kyi bu nga'i lus ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod
do/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni mdzes pa ban sngag pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ bsod nams brgya stong bas na tu lhag pa'i dpal dang ldan/
pa'o/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ sas rgyas kyi zhing de la ngan pa'i 'du
shes ma skyid cig de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ btsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasabadag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs
dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bskyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon pa la
'phags pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas
@#// kyi zhing de nas ma g.yos shing/ stan de las ma las par 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs po'i//

sku dbyangs de ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gdan gyi drung du pad+ma chu ba/
na gsar 'dab mni dngul snying po ni bats+tsha dang/ ne tse 'am ci las grub pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byung bar gyur to/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pas pad+ma bkod pa byung ba de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan

'das la da ltar chu ban gsar/ 'dab ma ni dadul/ snying po na pad+ma dang/ rje tso 'am ci las grub pa'i pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags )
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal 'di nishar phyogs logs nas 'jig rten gyi khams
rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa nas ) bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po ma rteg
kun tu rgyas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs byung chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor rung bdun
du bar du nga la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di 'ong ba
de'i snga ltas so de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bam ldan 'dus rigs kyi bu des/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
chogs ci bgyis na dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa des 'di lta bu'i khyad par 'dra thob/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ting nga'adzin gang la sbyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag gis mnyan par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de la spyad par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon po re re 'dra ba dang/ kha ngog
ci 'dra ba dang/ gzugs ci 'dra ba dang/ rtags ci 'dra ba dang ) dbyibs ci 'dra ba dang de'i spyod pa ci lags pa bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de blta ba
bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das brdaltas gang gis bskul ma thag tu ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'jig rtenagyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchibar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i brda las
shig de bzhin gshegs pas legs par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus longs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang la 'di skad gsungs so/ canas brda ltas/
gang gi myong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjang 'dir mchi ba de lta bu'i brda sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod cig/
de nas bcon ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chon mang gi de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
soms dpa' sems dpa'achen bo sangasang po'i dbyangs bskul ba'i phyir 'jam dba' gzhon nur gyur pa 'di rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bu mashu mthong bar dga' lis rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig
rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di gshegashang ces de lta bu'i brda mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'o sang sang bo'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma drin mod po ska ra ma 'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
lan gsum bskor ba byas te ) byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bo de dag gi yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams
rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te zhing dag ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/ pad+ma'ichar ni rab tu
'bebs sa la snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong len cing mig na ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/ bzhanan zla ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lcags/ lus kyi mdog gser gyi
kha dog 'dral/ lus bsod nams brgya stong gis ni brgyan dpal gyis na rab tu 'bar/ gzi brjid kyis ni[%]na tu lhang nger gyur/ lus ni mtshan rnams kyis rnam par spras/ lus
srod mad kyi bu'i lus ltar 'khrigs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsags por zhugs te/ nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su
pa skor cing mdun du bdar nas 'ongs te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba dang/ bya rgod phung po'i ro ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas khang pa brtsegs pa de nas babs
te brgya stongar ba'i mu tig gi 'brang ba thogs shing/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun
bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mu tig 'phreng ba phul la// phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'a dpe ma drin med pa skar ma'i rgyal bo me tog kun tu rgyas pas/
bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ mang ba nyung ngam/ skyod pa yang ngam ( stobs dang bde bar gnas sam/ zhes snyan gsol lo// btsam ldan 'das de 'di skad ces
kyang gsung ste/ bcom ldan 'das khyed bzed dam gzhos sam/ khams rnams 'thunanam/ khyod kyisams can rnams go sa yom/ gdul sa 'am gtsang ma 'dod dam/
ha cang 'dod chags ma spyod dam/ ha cang zhe sdang mi spyod dam/ ha cang gti mug tu mi skyod rum/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can dgashin tu phrag dog can ma yin nam/ sar/
sna can ma yin nam/ mar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ bar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ bram zer mi 'dzin pas len ma log par lta ba ma yin nam/
sems ma dul bam yin nam// dbang po ma bsrungs pa ma yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sams can de dag gis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgrwa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang de rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gyi nang du bzhugs pa chos gsan
ba'i phyi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gshegs sam/ brjom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la yong/ bcom ldan 'das de'i 'dri ba/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rin chen mang de brjod dam/ gzhes sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang ring du gnas sam zhes gsung ngo// bcom
ldan 'das de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku blta bar bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku ) de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du
gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'dus pa rin chen mang la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa' sems 'ba' chen bo sangasang po'i dbyangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su
mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen ma nga mthong bar 'tshal nas mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rin chen mang gis/ byang chub sems da pa' sams dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la 'di sad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dang dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyus kAkya thub pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'a mdun pa dang/
sgo 'jam dwapa la ga zhon nur gyur pa blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa legs so legs so/ des bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo ba'i dpal
gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi drung du sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji
lta bu zhig bskrun/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
ba0 dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dbal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sngon byungab 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa mthong na dga' bo la 'jig rten gyi khams gzungs thugs
cad shin tu ston par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin dang/ ngo sgra rgyal bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung// rigs kyi bu bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin dang rje sgra rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i debyangs
kyis sil snyan brgya stong rab tu blangs te lo khri nyis stong du mchod pa byas so// rin po che sna bdun gyi snod brgyud khri bzhi stong khul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa srin dung/
nga sgra rgyal po'i gsung rab de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po sang sang bo'i dbyangs kyis de lta bu'i dad pa thob bo// de tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra'i rgyal po la mchod pa byas shing snod brgyud khri bzhi stong de dag khul bo de gzhan zhig yin snyam/
waka gyu@#// du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar gyuran/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang gis bcom ldan
'das dod pa zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus sprin dang rje sgra'i rgyal po de la mchod pa byas pa dang/ snod de dag kyang phul ba de ni/ byang chub sems
dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di nyid yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsun/
bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yongs su sbyang ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangasang bo'i dbyangs 'dis/ sngon
gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gapa'i klung gi bye ma sad mthong ngo/ khapa'i dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'du mthong ngam/ bad+ma'i
dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal byang chug
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di ni gzugs mang pos dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar bo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/ 'di lta ste/ la lar tshas
pa'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dmag dpon gyi
gzugs kyis/ la lar na mchog gi gzugs kyis/ la lar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni khams kyi rgyal po 'i gzugs kyis/ la lar na tshong dpon gyis
gzugs kyis/ lalar ni khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis/ la la ni grong mi'i gzugs kyis/ la lar na bram ze'i gzugs kyis/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam
grangs 'ad ston to// la lar na dge slong gi gzugs kyis/ la lar na dge slong ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar na dge bsnyen gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar na dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs
kyis ) la lar ni tshong dpon gyi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/ lar ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar na grong mi'i chungama'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni phye lu'i ga tshug
kyis )la la ra na bu mo'i gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po sang sang po'i dbyas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di sams can
rnams la son te/ rigs kyi bu gzugs de sud kun tu ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo sang sang bo'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pasmadakar po 'i chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di sams can rnams la ston to// kha cig la na gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi bar gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i
dbyangs kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'dasams can rnams la ston to// kha cig la ni lha ma yin gyi gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni namakha' lding gi
gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni mi 'am ci'i gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni lho 'bu chen po'i gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i de byangs
dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnamagras 'di sems can rnams la ston to// sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ ma
sgo khom par skye ba'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa nga sang po'i dbyangs skyo ba par 'gyur ro// btsun mo'a'i ler gyi nang na 'dug pa'i bar
gyi sa mas can rnams la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po 'chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems can rnams la ston to// pad+ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang bo'i dbyas na/ 'jig rten gyi/
khams mi mdzadadu skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyob pa// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyang sa'adi nga snyad kyis
gzugs su sprul bas/ dam ba'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to// skyes bu dam pa 'de'i rdzu 'phrul yong nyams pa mang shes rab kyapa/
tums pa med de// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po 'i dbyangs ni yi shes kyi snang ba 'di nyid kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ni snang
ngo 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'di byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to//
tanas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams latan thos kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sams can rnams la/ rang sangs rgyus kyi
gzugs kyis chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ring bsrel gyi bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsral ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can
rnam la/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ston to// pad+ma'i dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyang san yashes kyi
stobs bskyed pa thob pa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi 'di sku da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
sgra byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po'i sa nga sang po'i dbyangs dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'di btsem ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis sems can de skad btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/ deskad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasashAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ting de 'dzin gang
skul gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang bo'i dbyangs kyis 'di ltar sems can dbag tu med pa'i don byas pa ni/ gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yin no// sang sang bo 'i dbyangs kyis le'u 'di bshad pa no/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang pa'i dbyangs dang lhan cig du/
byang chub sems dba' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis/ gzugs thams cad yang dag par
ston pa ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa de dag gis kyang gzugs
thams cad yang dag pa ston pa'i ting nge 'dzan thob par gyur to// denas byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis btsem ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten la yongasashing rgya chapa'i mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yos bar
byed 2 pad+ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ sal snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong na lenatsang/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te
mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu slar rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i
skya 'drub ma dri ma med pa skar ma'irgyal po me tog kun turgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bdag gis sems
can gyi don bgyis so// bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten yang mthong ngo// phyag
kyang bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang mthong/ phyag kyang bgyis so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang mathong ngo// byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi shugs thob pa de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pa de yang mthong ngo// byang chub sems
dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad kyis kyang ) gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
zla sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong gis ma skyaba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyis kyang/ ma ba'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// sang sang po'i debyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ li'u
rtsogasum pa'o/// bam po bcu gsum pa ste tha ma'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las/
langs te ) bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom laMna'adas
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ de ci'i slad du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan ' ris kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bko' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di la sems
can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji skad cig sdug bsngal gang dag myong bar gyur pa de dag gis gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming thos na de
dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi khung po de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi busems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug
gi ming 'dzin pa de dag gal te/ me'i phung po chen por lhung na yang de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/
me'i phung bo chen po de las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te/ chu klung dag gis khyer la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyan
'as gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ chu klung de dag thams cad kyis sams can de dag thams cad g.yel tshugs par byed do// rigs kyi bu gal te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
rgya mtsho'i nang du grur zhugs te/ 'gron bu dang/ gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ ba zlum dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ byi ru dang/ sdug dang da/
mu tig dmar po la sogs pa'i phyir dong ba de rnams rlunganag bos/ srin mo'i gling du 'phangs par gyur la/ de nas sems can gcig 'ga' zhig gis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
la bos na/ de dag thams cad srin mo'i gling de nas thar bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces
bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu gal te/ bsad bar bskor ba las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na ) gshed ma de dag gi mtshon cha dum bu dum bur chagaci grub par 'gyur ro//
rigs kyi bu gal te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod sbyin dang srin pos gang bar gyur myong byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po/ spyan ras
[6 ]gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa la de dag thamacad kyis snang bsams kyis blta yang mi phod do// rigs kyi bu sams tsan la la lcags sgrog dang/ shing sgrog tu bcug par gyur
na zhus yod kyang rung nyes med kyang rung byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming nas phyung bas/ lcags sgrog dang shing sgrog tu bcug pa/
de dag gi bu ga bye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'achen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yon can dang/ chom rkun dang/ dgra lag na mtshon cha thogs pas gang bar gyur te/ der ded dpon gcig gis/ 'dren pa mngapo phalapo
ches phyug pa ded de dong ba las/ 'dong ba de dug gis g.yon can dang/ chom rkun dung 3 dgru lag na mtshon thogs pa de mthong// mthong nas kyang 'jigs shing sgrug ste/
bdag cag skyabs med par shes pa las/ ded dpon des 'dron pa mang po la 'di skad ces ma 'jigasashig/ rigs kyi bu dag ma 'jigs shig/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la sgra skad gcig tu bos shig dang/ deng byed chom rkun gyis 'jigs ba 'di dang/ dgra yis
ba[7 ]@#// 'jigs pa 'di las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo la/ de nas 'dren pa mang bo thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bos
te/ 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes ming nas phyung ma thug tu
kyi 'dren pa phal po che de dag 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang shug gi mthu
na de 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag 'dod chags spyad pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la phyag byas na/
wA 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sams can gang dag zhi srang la spyod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la phyag
byas n/ zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dug gti mug spyad pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
phyag byas n/ gdi mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ roges
kyi bu su bud med du 'dod pa gdul la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal na/ de las bu pho 'byung// gzugs bzang ba
mdzes la blta na sdug pa khye'u yi mtshan dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa 'byung ngo// gang bu mo 'dod pa ji lang bu mo 'byung ste/ gzugs
bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa bu mo'i mtshan dang ldan pa skya bo mang bo yid du 'ong zhing sdugapa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'byung ngo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' soms
dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagi mthu ni de 'dra'o// gang dag byang chub semasaM dpa' sams dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal ba de dag don
yod pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa gang zhig sas

rgyus brtsom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyad dag la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang yang gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gda'i krung drug cu rtsaganyis kyi bye ma
stod bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhingagazhes pa de dag la ) na bza' dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims cha dang/ stun gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad kyis mchod pa byed na/ rigs
@#/ kyi bu 'di jisnyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa tsam zhig skyad/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gzhi de las
bsod nams skyed pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das mang la gas so// bde bar gshegs pa mngalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de nyid la bkur sti byas pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa drang/ gang gis tha na byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag lan
gcig byas pa dang/ ming 'dzin pa bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gcig mnyam ste/ lcag pa yang med 'phags pa yang mo der/ gang gis sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das
gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi phyi ma snyad la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing
mang 'dzon po'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gtug de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang thar par bya bar sa ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa'
[po/ ]chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mi 'dzin pa de dag gi bsod nams de ltar dpag tu me da do// de nas bcom ldan ' dus la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
'dan rnam par rgyu/ ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thabs mkhas pa'i yul ni ci 'dra bzhi ga
lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang ba com ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
kyi bu gang dgan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi gzug kyis saA canam la chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag yod do//
gang dgu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi ba mas dag kyang yod do/ sems/
can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug ring sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi chos ston to// kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis/
khacig la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis/ sems can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug dri za'i gzugs kyi chos ston to// gnod sbyin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la na/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// dbang phyug gis 'dul ba'i
sems can rnams la ni/ dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis chos ston to// dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba'i sams can rnams la ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to//
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyi chos ston to// sha trAs 'dul ba'i sams can rnams la nisha za'i
gzugs kyis tshes ston to// mtshog gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ mchog gi gzugs kyis chos ston to// dmag dpon gyis 'dul ba'i sams can rnams la ni )
dmag dpon gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// bram zes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ bram zes gzugs kyis chos ston to// lag rdo rjes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/
hi lag na rdo rjesagazugs kyi chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no//
rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug 'di 'jigs pa ni sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes kun gyis shes so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdugagis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la chos kyis dga' ba stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas bdag gi mgul nas/ srang brgya stong ra ba'i mug gi do shal bkrol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la chos kyi dga' ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa bdagalas chos kyi dga' ba 'di longashig des ma blangs nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi
bod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis mu tig gi donal 'di bdag la
[a/ ]@#// sing brtse ba'iphyir longashig/ denas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po blo grosami zad pa la snying brtse ba dang/ 'khor bzhi po de dag dang/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang 3 lu ma yin dang/ namamo ba'i lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/
lho 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang ma ma yin pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ blo gros mi zad pa las mu tig gi do shal blangs so// blangs nas cha
'a gnyis su bgos te/ bgos nas cha gcig na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phul lo// chagacigan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po
che'i mchod rten la phul lo// rigs kyi bu byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul
bas rnam b.rargyu'o// de la de'i chos nyid ni 'di skad ces bya'o// rgyul mtshan khro bos blo gros mi zad la// de yi don gyi skun kun dris pa// rgyal ba'i sras bo 'di ltaratso
mi ra// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes 'a di bgyi// des na de yi phyogs rnams kun bsdus te/ 3 smon lam rgya mtsho blo gros mi zad pas// rgyal mtshan khro bo de la 'di/
skad smras// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyod pa don// bskal pa bsam yas bye ba du ma bsgyur// sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mang po la// smon lam ji ltar rab tornam
par sbyangs// de dag kho bos rab tu bshad kyis nyon// mnyan par byas sam 'on te la bar byed// ma kyis de ltar rjes su dran pa yang// srog chags rnams na 'bras bu mor
par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal srid pa mya ngan kun sel byed/ gal te gsod pas me me dong du yang// bsad par du phyir btang ba'i yad kyis ni// snganaras gzigs kyi dbang po
dranAn ni// chusaM btab bzhin du ma dag zhi bar 'gyur/ rgya mtsho dang ni mi ngan rgal na yang// gludang 'byung po lha ma yin gnas su// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang bo drananani/
chu yi rgyal po rnams kyang mi nub po// rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis bsad pa'i phyir// ri rab lhun po'i rtsa nas bod na yang// sbyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// tim lta bu r
naman kha' gnas par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje yi na de dag kyang// bsad pa'i phyir nas bar lo ngosan yang// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang bo dran na ni// ba spu'i khung tsam btses par
mi nus so// bsad pa'i sams kyis lag na mtshon thogs te// dgra tshogs mang po'i kun tubaskor na yang// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang bo drananani/ dang ma thag tu
byams pa'i sems su 'gyur// gal te bsad pa che bar 'ongs nas su// gshed ma mi yi dbang du gyur na yang// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dranan/ byams pa lags
na si mchon cha dum bur dum bur 'gyur// de lta gang ngam lcags las byas pa yi// khong spel dang ni gdos kyis bcings na yang/ sman ras gzigs kyi dbang po/
zla drun nan// bcings pa myur du rnam par chad par 'gyur// sngags dang stobs dang sman dang rig sngags dang// ro langs pa dang 'byung po lus 'jigos pa// sbyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang po dran na ni/ gang nas rab tu btang ba dor sar 'gro// gnod sbyin lha min 'byung po klu 'barab/ mdangs 'phrog pa yis yongs su bskor na yang/ spyanaras
! gzigs kyi dbang po dran nan)/ ba spu khung tsam gtsus par yong ma nus// mchab sen rnon rab tu 'jigs pa yi// gcan gzan ma rungs pa yis bskoran yang// spyanaras
gzigs kyi dbang po dran nan/ myur bar phyogs kun tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur// mig 'jigs me lce lta bu r yod 'phro ba// mag dug can gyi yongs su bskor na yang/ spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ shin tu myur bar dug po yod par 'gyur// bzang po klog kyang 'byung zhing sdug pa yi// sngon las dang sar ba char 'bab pa// spyan ras
[c/ ]gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar rab du zhi// sdug bsngal mang po brgya yis gsas pa dang// sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba'i sams can mthong// ye shes
dge ba'i stobs kyis spyan ras gzigs// dobs lha bcas 'gro ba'i skyob pa po// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ba rol song ba ste// thabs dang yo shes yangs pa bsubs pas na//
khyogs bcu'i 'gro ba mang bo thams cad dang// ma lus zhing kun tu yang rab tu snang// srog chags rnams kyi ngana'agro'i 'jigs pa dang// mi khom pa dang sems can dmyal ba dang
khyol song dang ni gshin rjes bsgo ba dang// skye rgan bas gzir ba mthar zhi byed// shinatu dge ba'i sbyin te byams pa'i sbyin// thabs dang shes rab khyad par yod pa'i na//
snying rje'i spyan dang byams pa'i spyan dang ldan// zhal bzung na bzang shin tu blta 'dod pa// drim mid pa dri ma bral ba'i 'od// rab rib mad pa ye shes kyi ma'i 'od/ sprin gyis
tshod bzhed par gyur pa'i 'od/ 'jig rten dugan lhag ge lhang nger mdzad// snying rje las byung tshul khrims grags pa ste// dge ba'i yon tan byams yid sprin chen po// srog
chags rnams kyi nyon mongs ma zhi byed// chos kyi char pa bdud rtsi rab tu 'bebs// 'thab mo dang ni rtsod cing 'gyed pa la// 'jigs chenagayul ngor skyes bu song na yang// spyan ras/
gzigs kyi dbang po dran nan// de ma thag tu dge rnams rab tu zhi// sprin gyi sgra dang rnga bo che yi sgra// 'brug gi sgra dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan pa// dbyangs kyi
dkyil 'khor pha rol phyin pa ste// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran par bya// dag pa'i sams can sbyan ras gzigs dbang po// the tshom ma zo dran byos dran par bgyis// 'chiba'i/
dang nyon mongs gtses pa yi// mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du yang 'gyur// yon tan thams cad kyi ni ba rol phyin// sems can kun la snying rje byams pa'i spun// yang dag
yon tan yon tan rgya mtsho// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag byar 'os// 'di ltar 'gro ba rnams la snying brtse ba// phyi ma'i dus na sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// 'jigs dang mya ngan thoms
cad 'jig byed pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran par bya// 'jig rten dbang po rgyal po gtso bo ste// dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten mchod// bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sbyang
nas su// rdul bral bla na med pa byang chub thob// 'dren pa snang ba mtha' yas g.yas g.yon na// gsal yab thogs tu de bzhin g.yob cing 'dug/ sgyur ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
kyang/ zhing rnams kun tu song nas rgyal ba mchod// nub kyi phyogs na bde ba'i 'byung gnas te// rdul bral 'jig rten khams na bde ba can// de na sems can kha lo sgyur ba yi// 'drenupa tshe
mtha' yas pa'ang de ltar bzhugs// der ni bud med rnams kyang ma 'byung ste// rnam pa kun tu g.yam pa'i chos med do// rgyal ba'i sras bo de dag sa te skye// drin mad pa'i pad+ma'i snying bor

'dug/ 'dren patshamatha' yas pa de nyid kyang// pad+ma'i snying po dri med dga' ba la// seng ge'i khri la rab tu bzhugs pa yang// sA la'i rgyal po lta bu r rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i 'di'ang
dbazhin te// srid pa gsum na de 'dra yong mad do// gang gis spyan ras gzigs dbangaming thos pa// de yi bsod nams dgan mi zad 'gyur// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
ngos 'dzin stan las la ba te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das su dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi le'u/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
ras gzigs dngang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dam
ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so// kun nas sgo'i le'u bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ bla na med pa/
[s/ ]@#// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugag rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi
pa 'o/// de nas btsom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan bstsal pa
grangs med par gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la'ajig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rig par ng zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jigarten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha losgyur ba/ banam da ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyus pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byungang// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i
gsung rab laM : rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba byung// rigs kyi bu dag rgyal bo dag babakod pa de'i chung ma dri mamed pas byin ba zhes bya ba zhig yod do// rigs kyi bu dgargyal po dge ba bkod
pa de la bu gnyis yod do/ gcig gi ming na dri ma med pa'i snying po/ gcig gi ming na dri ma med pa'i mig ste/ khye'u de gnyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan/ shes rab dang ldan/ bsod nams dang ldan

[/]ye shes dang ldan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par gyur te// 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi wa rol tuphyin pa dang/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/
dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dgal brtson par gyur to 4 thams cad kyi pha rol tu son par gyur to// drim med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol

tu song ngo// rgyu skar dang skar ma dang nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo// drim med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo// dri ma med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu
song ngo//dpa' ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo// gzi brjid chen po'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi b.rol tu song bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de yang de'i tshe 'i dus na/
sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba dang/ rgyal po dge kha bkod pa de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khya'adrim

med pa'i snying po dang/ khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig bdag cag skyed pa'i mgal ba dor song ste/ phyi nas sor mo bsu thal mo sbyar te bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yum tshur spyon/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang

sh+tsa bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhud do//

ci'i slad du zhe na/ yum bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan [”] skar ma'i rgyal po ma rtog kun tu rgyas pa de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
don gyi mdun dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i tshes kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'od kyis de mnyan ba pa'i phyir bzhud do// rigs kyi bu dag de skadaces smras nas/ rgyal po'i chung ma dri mamed

bas byin pa khye'u dri ma med pa'i sing po dang/ dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi la rgyal po dge babakod pa 'di bram ze la dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba'i
phyir 'gror mi ster to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u driu med pa'i snying po dang/ khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar nas/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so
bdag cag logapar lta ba'i khyim du skyes te/ bdag cag gi chos kyi rgyal po'i bu ma lags pa lta rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po'i chung ma drim med pas byin pas khyo'u de dag la 'di skad ces skyes

[/ ]rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis bdag cag gi la rgyal po dge ba bkodapa la snying brtse ba'i phyir cho 'phrulacung zad cig legs par ston cig dang/ khyed la dad par 'gyur yang srid kyis/ sems dad par gyur
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po'am rtog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gan du 'dong bar gnang ngo/

rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang/ khye'u drim med pa'i mig gis de'i tshe ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags nas pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la snying brtse ba'i phyir
sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i cho'aphrul zung du byed de// de dag nam mkha' bar snang de la drong nas nyal bar byed do// bar snang de la 'chag go/ bar snang de la rdul sprug go/ bar snang de nyid la
lus kyi spar nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing// lus kyi stod nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do// lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyan gtong zhing lus kyi smadanas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do//
dengag nam mkha' do tidi la chen por gyur nas chung ngur gyur/ chung dur gyur nas chen por gyur to// bar snang de nyid las mi snang bar gyur te/ sa la byung nas nam mkha' la 'bag go/ rigs kyi

bu dag khye'u de gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul de snyad kyis rang gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa btul to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas khye'u de gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag
@#// mthong nas de'i) rim zhing mgu la yi de rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas sor mo bcu'i rgyal mo sbyar te/ khye'u de dag la 'di skad ces
rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi ston pa su/ khyed su'i slob ma zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyi rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces sas so// rgyal po//
chen po btsem ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
la rin po che'i byang chub kyi shing drungan/ chos kyi gdan la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i
chos kyi rnam grang gin du rgyas par rab tu 'chad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bdag cagan re'i slob ma'o// rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po ge nga
bkod pas khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu drag khyed kyi ston pa blta zhing/ btsem ldan 'das de'i drung du bdag kyang 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis bar
snang de las babs nas/ bdag cag skyod pa'i ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yum bdag cag gis yang 'di
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btul lags so// bdag cag gis yab kyi ston pa bgyi ba bgyis so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de las rab tu 'byung na/ yum de ni bdag cag gtang
ba'i rigs so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u drim med pa'i snying po dang/ khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis de'i tsho bangag rgyag bskyod pa'i sa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// khyim med rab
'byung bar ni// yum gyis bdag cag gnang bar mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa red par dka'// bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bgyi// u dum wara'i ma togaltar// rgyal ba shin tu red par dka'// dul ba
'byor ba'ang rnyed dka' bas// rab tu 'byung gis gtang du gsol// rgyal po'i chung ma drimamed pas byin pas sas pa/ de ring khyed gnyis btang bar bya// byis pa dag ga legs par deng// de bzhin
gshegs pa red dka' bas// bdag kyang rab tu 'byung b.ratu// rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas khag cag gi pha dang ma de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
yab yum legs so tshur spyon/ khyed dang thamasacad lhan cig bzhud do// bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyang sasnyan skar ma'i rgyal pom tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhud do// de ci'i slad du zhen/ yab yum sangs rgyas 'byung ba red par dka'
[#]@#// dmyu u dum wa ra'i ma tog dang 'dra zhing/ gnya' shing gi bu gar ru sbal gyi mgrin pa chud pa dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// yab yum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'byung ba redapar
dka' lta/ de bas na yang yum bdagacag bsod nams mchog gis brtan pa'i gsung rab 'di lta bu la skyes te/ yab mu ma bag gtang na legs te// bdag cag mchi zhing/ btsem ldan 'dus/
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab yum
'tsho de bzhin gshegs pa mthongan red par dka' ba dang/ da ltar gyi dus na 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi rgyal po rid par dka' ba dang/ 'jalta bu'i dal ba 'byor pa shin red par dka' ba'i slad du'o//
rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe na/ rgyal po dgel bkod pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor las/ smras brgyad khri bzhi stongam pa'i chos pad+ma da pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i snod du gyur to// khye'u dri ma med

pa'i mig dang/ khye'u pAya med pa'i snying pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la spyad de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dungan song thamasacad ji ltar bsal snyam nas/ sems can thams cad kyi ngan song

thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sbyar par gyur to// khye'u de dag gis ma dri ma me da pas byin pa rgyal po'i chung ma de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun bstan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
gsang ba'i gnas shes so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyi rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de bzhinagashegs pa'i bstan pa la btul te/ zhugs par byas nas yongs su smin par byas te mnyen
mab dang/ rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de dang ) ma namadab dang/ rgyal bo dgab bkod pa'i bu khye'u de gnyis kyang srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/
blon po dang bcas te thams cad 'grogs nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
kun tu rgyas pa de ga la ba der song ste phyi nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal de/ btsam ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skur ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa des rgyal po
dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas te lhags b.ramakhyen nas chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par
rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la chos kyi gtam rgyas shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag bar 'dzin du bcug/
yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po dge ba bkodapa la chos kyi gtam gyis
shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pas/ de'atsha tshim zhing mgul ya drangs te rab tu gsa'i
dga' ba dang/ yadabade ba skyesanas/ nubo cod pan gyis bcings te rgyal por bcuganas/ bu dang gnyen 'drab dang/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ rgyal po'i chung ma drimamed pas phyin pa de yang
bud med kyi tshogs thams cad dang bcas pas nyakhor ba khye'ud gnyis dang lhag tu srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cikatu 'grogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

tshopar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la/ dad pas khyim nas khyimamed par rab tu byung ste/ rab tu byung nas rgyal po dge ba
bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsam pa dang/ bsgom pa dang/ kun chub par bya ba la brtson par gyur to/
rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa le brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dasanas/ yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad bakod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tudi'i
tshe namamakha' la ta la bdun tsam du'alags so// de nas rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skar rtse gas[2:]bo ba pa da drag du 'di gnyis ston pa lagang de ga nga
'di dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyis la bar gyur pa chen po de las bzlog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu bzhag go/ yongs su smin par bgyis zhugs par bgyis so// de bzhin gshegs
ga la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba'i slad du yang skal to// bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi dge ba'i yoshes ra ti no rna loge ba'i rtsa ba dran par bgyi ba'i slad du bu'i se zugs
kyis bdag gis khyim du skyas so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin sa gnas pa dgra bcom pa sangato[“]rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar

ma'i rgyal po ma rtog kun tu rgyas pas/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po re re bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhinano// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu
'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni srid pa'i 'gro ba dang/ 'chi 'pho'i gnas thams cad du skyes pa na yang [a ]nga ngag sbyor yi 4 30[“']ra gnas pa rang/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang/ 'dzud pa dang/ yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams red sla bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/
rage ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yo sa su zin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bltar 'dzung pa'i gnas 'di ni rgya che ba'o// rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di ga sa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong
lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/

sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed la mchod par byed do// sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ leg bar lta ba'i sams can rnams yang dag par lta ba la brtson 'grus bskyed
pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos pad+madakar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzan par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod ba nam mkha' dkyil de nas babs te/
sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal pom tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'ang skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bu'i yashes dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i slad du
dbu'i gtsug tog rnam par madzes/ sban dri ma mchis pa lags smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes shing zla ba dang dung ltar dkar la mdzes mnyam zhing thags bzang ba'i tshoms kyi
brang ba zhal gyi nang nas mdzes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgros me tog bim pa ltar dmar ba dang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan mdzes pa/ dbazhin gshegs pas legs par bshad
dugasol/ rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bked pas/ yon tan desnyad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa mang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po ma tog kun tu rgyas pa de la mngon par bstong nas yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de la bstod de/de'i tshe lu com ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di don che zhing yon tan bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dul ba gsungs te/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa legs par
bcas pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das deng san ra bdag slar sems kyi dbang du mchibar ma bgyi'o// slar log par lta pa'i dbang du mibar mi bgyi'o// slar khro ba'i dbang du mchi bar
[t]@#// mi bgyi'o// slar sngog pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dbang du mchi bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi dge ba'i chos 'di sud dang ldan pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
drung du mchi bar ma 'tshal lo zhes sas te de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal
bo mi rtog kun tu rgyas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bar snang la song ste 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang/ rgyal po'i chung ma drim med pas byin pa des/

srang brgya stong ra ba'i mu tig gi rgyun brang brtsomaldan 'das kyi stong gi bar snang la gtor to// mu tig gi rgyan phreng de gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi stong namu tig gi rgyan phreng gi khang pa brtsegs pa/

gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ ngos mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba blta na sdug pa gnas bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa der ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma gting ba'i khri 'byung ngo/ khri de la/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par snang ngo// de nas rgyal po dag babakod pa de 'di snyam du sems de// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di ni mthu che zhing/ de bzhin gsheg/
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbusan mdzes shing blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par gda'o
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas 'khor bzhi po de dag la bka'astsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po dge babakodapa
ma mkha'i dkyil na 'dugatsange seng ge'i sgra sgrogs po mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po dge babakod/
pas nga'i bstan pa la dge slong gi tshul du byas nas/ bskal pa mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs ldan du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jibasten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur pa/ bla na med pa la drung mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
rem ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten dubyung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom tshigs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po da
byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag du med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams yangs ldan yang lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur ro// de

ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur/
[:]3/ @#// ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar gyuran/ rigs kyi bu dag khyedakyis de ltar mibalta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub
lpa sa mas dba' sams dpa'achen po pad+ma'i dpal 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dusan/ rgyal po dag bkod po zhesabya bar gyur to/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i san/ rgyal po'i chung ma drin med pas
byin pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod somanyi 'am yid gnyis sam/ thatsom za ba gyur na/ rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// datsa'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpachen po rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas na zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po dag
ba bkod pa dang/ sams can de dag la snying brjod pa'i phyir/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i chung mar des khas blas par gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u de gnyis su gyur pa de dag
gzhanadagacig yin pa snyam du byed som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ btsom za bar gyuran/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen sman gyi rgyal po dang/ sman yang
ga 'bags 'di nyidad tshod 'i dus na/ rgyal po dge babakod pa de'i bu gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag de lta byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa'atshanapo sman gyi rgyal po dang/ sman yang dag
'bags gas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// skyes bu dam pa 'di nyin yang bsam gyis mi khyab/
ba'i chos kyis yang dag pa phags pa'o// gang dag skyes bu dam pa 'diganyis kyi mnge 'dzin pa de dag thams cad kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'dzig rten gyis phyag bya bar gyur ro// sngon gyi sbyor ba'o/
le'u'adibashad pan/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mog rdul mdatsang dris dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ rgyal po dag ba bkod pa'i sngon gyi sbyor pa'i le'u zhes bya sta/
Tishu rtsa lnga'o// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis
yongs su bskoracing mdun du bdar/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang ) lto'aphya chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin/
pa dag gis kyang/ yos su bskor cing mdun du bdar to/ lhan sgrige tu shar phyogs nas zhing dag nirab tu g.yo bar byed ( pa'i mar ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyanabye ba phrug
khrig brgya stongani rab tu len cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chenapo dang/ byang nub soms dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen podang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrulan
@#// po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chab ti dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid chen po 'barapa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' theg pa chen po dang byang chub sems
dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am deng/ lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mo ma yin pa'i rnam
par 'phrul pa chen po dang/ de ltarardzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgagis/ byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mjed 'dir phyin nas/ de ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de pazhin
gshegs pa dkon mchog gzi brjid mngon 'phags rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtanagyi khams mi mjed 'din/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma
dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa de mnyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du bdag mchisaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa'argyastong 'di dag sAd 'di dag kyang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i slad du mchis so/ de'i slad dubcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ra/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas kyis/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dka' po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnams la cher legs par bshad dugasol/ de skad cesagasol
nas bcom ldan 'asakyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'doskad ces bka' su la to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag/
mgo smos pa tsam gyis khong du chud pa sha stag go/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam gras 'din 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'o//
khyang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa ) bcom ldan 'das de lta legs so// bde b.ragashegs pa dod lta legs so// denas 'khor der dge slong dang ) dge slong
ma dang/ dag bstan dang dge bsnyen ma 'dus pa de dag dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dal rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po kun tubazang po la 'di skadaces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i bud med kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par
[z @#// 'gyur// bzhi kheng zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasakyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsab bskyed par 'gyur ba dang/ nges pa'i phung
po la gnas par 'gyurab dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir blanamadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed par 'gyur bste/ gas kyi bu chos bzhi bo de dgadung
ldan pa'i bud med kyis dam pa'i chos pad+madakar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'dasa'abyong chub semasadapa' sems dang 'chen po kun
chu bzang ngos 'asad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sladama' slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tham la mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la bsrung bar bgyi'o// bde legs su 'gyur
bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar bgyi'o// jug gzhirje bar bgyi'o// chinas chos smrab de dag la glagos lta ba dang/ skabs tshol ba gang dag gis kyang glags ma)dpar 'gyur nga dang/ bdud sdig can dang
bdud kyi bu rnams dang/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang/ bdud kyi 'khor glags lta ba dang/ skabs tshol ba rnams kyi glogs med par 'gyur ba nas/ bdud
kyis kun nas ldang ba'i bar du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ lha'i bu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ yi dgas dang/ srul po dang/ gshed byed dang/ rolangs dag las ches skya ba dil glogs lta ba dang/
skabs tsholan yang skabs rnyed par ma 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos skya ba de la rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o// bskyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
'das gang gi ni chos snab de chos kyi rnam grangs 'dil sems shing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang/ 'chag pa la zhugs par gyur ba de'i tsho 3chos kyi rnam grags 'di bsrung ba'i slad du/ bdag grub
pom rgyal bo thalakar mche ba drug bal 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ chos skye ba de 2chag ba'i gnas su chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o//
gang gi tshe chos skya ba de ches kyi rnam grangs 'di sems shing rnal 'byor gyi rjes su zhugs pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las thonatshig dang yi ge gcig tsam yang lan 'ga' nor bar gyur pa/
de'iri/ bdagaglang bo tsha'i rgyal po phular mchab drug pa la 'tshal nas/ chos skya bo de la bdag gi bstan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma nyams par zos su stsal to// chos skya ba des
bdags lus mthong zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'dim nyams par bdag las thosanasatshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tudaga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyesanas tshes kyi
rnam grangs 'di la brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bdag mthongamathag tu ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'khyil ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyuraro// bye ba brgya stong du 'khyil ba
zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sgra thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba 'gazungs thob par 'gyur re// ngaromaldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus
lnga brgyapa rnam lu dag myong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsAnanam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzan pa dang/ mdo sde 'di lta bu ya gir 'dri dang/ mdo sde 'di lta bu tsho ba
dang mdo sde 'di lta bu klog pa dang/ gang dag slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la chos kyi rnam grungs 'di'i ched du gdugs bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'chag cing brtson par gyur/
de dag la bdag gis sems can thamasacad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus bstan par bgyi'o// glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mtshab drug pa la katshal to/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogasakyis yongs
su bskor nas/ gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la chos smra ba de dag 'jug pa'i thad du mchi'o// mchis nas chos smra ba de dag la yang dog par bstan bar bgyi'oyang dag bar 'dzin du stsal bar
bgyi'o// yang dag par garbad bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o// dadag la gzungs kyang stsal dar bgyi'o// ci nas chos sgrub de dag la sus kyang mi tshugs bar
'gyur ba dang/ de dag la mi 'amami ma lags pas grags mirId par 'gyur ba dang/ budamedakyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur b.rade dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o// bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
[o]chad pa spang bar bgyi'o// dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos skyab de dag la 'dag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshigs 'di dag stsal bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'dus gzungs sngags kyitsheg
'di dag gsan du gsol// tad+ya thu/ a daN/ daNaT pa ti/ daNaDal rtan/ daNaT ku sha le/ daNakhasargyur/ sud+hari/ sud+har pa ti/ budad+hapany+tsani/ b+har Ni/ a brtani/ abartani/ a brtani/
sangag pa la ti/ sang g+hanarig+ha sane/ d+ha rma pa ri kAti/ sarbasatu/ ru du kosha@#/ a nu ga tesangag 'a'o to/ a nu brte/ brtanaM/ brtalasAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi
tshig 'di dag/ byang chub sems dang 'a gang gi rnaba'i dbang de la grag pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po kun tubazang po'i khyonegyi rlabs su rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
'das dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'din skyod na/ byang nub sems dpa' gang dag gi lag tu thob par gyuran/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de
dag gis/ byang chub semasadapa' kun tu bzang po'i mthu dang/ byang chub sems dpo' kun tu bzang po'i gatra brjod gyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag ge lag
tu thob bo snyam du deltar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang/ 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag gi byang chub semasadapa'akun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob
da ra 'gyuraro// semasacan de dag gis sangs rgyus mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag dengazhin gshegs
ba'i phyag gis spyi bo la byug por 'gyur ro// nga nem ldan 'das de dag gis bdag kyang dga' bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang dag mdo sde 'di yi gar 'drir skyel ba dang/ gang dag
'di'i don khong du chud par bgyid pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di yi ger bris pa de dga' di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur
te skyes ma thag tude'i drung du lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mar bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag rngabo ra tsam gyis cod pan dang/ lha'i bud dag gi nang na gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger bris pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang 'di 'dralags n/ gang drag lunganodapa dang/ kha ton bgyid pa dang/ sems pa dang/ yid la bgyadeng lta smos kyang ci
'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dam pa'i chosapad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam gras 'di sems kyis kun bsams te/ yagar bri bar bgyi'o// gang ma g.yeng bas yid la bgyid pas
yiger drin de la/ sangs rgyas stong gis phyag rkyang bara'agyur ro// 'di ba'i tshe yang sangs rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// ngan 'gro log par ltung b.ramamibar ma'agyur// 'di nas shi shes
nas kyang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ lha'i bu ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mdun gyisabaltas te/ chos 'chad pa der skye'o// delta lags pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
momakhas pas/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'digus par yigar bri bar bgyi'o// gus par lung mnod par bgyi'o// gus par kha ton du gyi'o// gus pa ra yid
la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi gar brisapa dang/ lung gnod pa dang/ kha ton bgyis pa dang/ bsgoms pa dang/ yid l bgyis pa ni da ltar yon tan dpag tum
mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar de'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bgyis te/
dedag gi yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ nas bdag gi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'adzam bu'i gling 'don spyod par 'gyur
bar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs par bgyi'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thubapas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la kun tu bzang po khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang ) 'di ltar bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldagashing
sang rje chen pos zin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yis zin pa'i sems bskyed bas/ khyod kyis chos smra ba de dag la byin gyi rlob par byed pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin
no: rigs kyi bu gang la la dag byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' na po kun tu bzang po'i ming 'dzin pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
shAkya thub pa mthong ba dang/ dam pa'i chos bad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gnas thos pa dang/ de dag gi rwa bzhin gshags pa shAkya thub pa mchod pa/
dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos bstan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dra rjes su yi rang ba dang// dbazhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de dag gi spyi
bor phyag bzhag pa dang/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'dashAkyaphrul pa la chos gos kyis g.yogs pa nga rig par bya'o// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bstan pa 'dzin par rig par bya'o// de dag 'jig rten rgyang 'phan pa la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag snyan dngags la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag la
byed pa dang/ rol mo byed pa dang/ rgyad dang/ shA'atshong dang/ shan bdang/ bya gag 'tshong ba dang/ phag 'tshong ba dang/ bud med gso ba'i soms can rnams la dga' ba mi 'gyur ro//
mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pa dang/ yi ger bris pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ bklags pa de dag gzhan la srid par ma 'gyur ro// sams can de dag chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de
dag so sor bdag nyid tshul bzhin yod la byed par 'gyur ro// rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag sems can rnamasakyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// deg slong
gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag 'dod chags kyis gzer bar ma'agyur ro// zhe sdang med pa dang/ gti mug med pa dang/ sar sna med pa dang/ 'chab pa med pa dang/ nga rgyalamed
badrang/ maba'i nga rgyal med pa dang/ lag pa'i nga rgyal med par 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po chos skya ba de dug bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes par 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po gang dag gis phyi

ma'i dus phyi ma'i/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong na bad sam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chukyi snying por 'grobal 'gyur ro//

rigs kyi bu 'di zhi bdud kyi thab mo'i tshogs las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung bar 'gyur ro// 'di'i chos kyi dung 'bud par/
